6149 //*****************************************************************************
6150 //
6151 // The following are defines for the bit fields in the ADC_O_PP register.
6152 //
6153 //*****************************************************************************
6154 #define ADC_PP_TS 0x00800000 // Temperature Sensor
6155 #define ADC_PP_RSL_M 0x007C0000 // Resolution
6156 #define ADC_PP_TYPE_M 0x00030000 // ADC Architecture
6157 #define ADC_PP_TYPE_SAR 0x00000000 // SAR
6158 #define ADC_PP_DC_M 0x0000FC00 // Digital Comparator Count
6159 #define ADC_PP_CH_M 0x000003F0 // ADC Channel Count
6160 #define ADC_PP_MSR_M 0x0000000F // Maximum ADC Sample Rate
6161 #define ADC_PP_MSR_125K 0x00000001 // 125 ksps
6162 #define ADC_PP_MSR_250K 0x00000003 // 250 ksps
6163 #define ADC_PP_MSR_500K 0x00000005 // 500 ksps
6164 #define ADC_PP_MSR_1M 0x00000007 // 1 Msps
6165 #define ADC_PP_RSL_S 18
6166 #define ADC_PP_DC_S 10
6167 #define ADC_PP_CH_S 4
6168 
6169 //*****************************************************************************
6170 //
6171 // The following are defines for the bit fields in the ADC_O_PC register.
6172 //
6173 //*****************************************************************************
6174 #define ADC_PC_SR_M 0x0000000F // ADC Sample Rate
6175 #define ADC_PC_SR_125K 0x00000001 // 125 ksps
6176 #define ADC_PC_SR_250K 0x00000003 // 250 ksps
6177 #define ADC_PC_SR_500K 0x00000005 // 500 ksps
6178 #define ADC_PC_SR_1M 0x00000007 // 1 Msps
6179 
6180 //*****************************************************************************
6181 //
6182 // The following are defines for the bit fields in the ADC_O_CC register.
6183 //
6184 //*****************************************************************************
6185 #define ADC_CC_CS_M 0x0000000F // ADC Clock Source
6186 #define ADC_CC_CS_SYSPLL 0x00000000 // PLL VCO divided by CLKDIV
6187 #define ADC_CC_CS_PIOSC 0x00000001 // PIOSC
6188 
6189 //*****************************************************************************
6190 //
6191 // The following are defines for the bit fields in the COMP_O_ACMIS register.
6192 //
6193 //*****************************************************************************
6194 #define COMP_ACMIS_IN1 0x00000002 // Comparator 1 Masked Interrupt
6195  // Status
6196 #define COMP_ACMIS_IN0 0x00000001 // Comparator 0 Masked Interrupt
6197  // Status
6198 
6199 //*****************************************************************************
6200 //
6201 // The following are defines for the bit fields in the COMP_O_ACRIS register.
6202 //
6203 //*****************************************************************************
6204 #define COMP_ACRIS_IN1 0x00000002 // Comparator 1 Interrupt Status
6205 #define COMP_ACRIS_IN0 0x00000001 // Comparator 0 Interrupt Status
6206 
6207 //*****************************************************************************
6208 //
6209 // The following are defines for the bit fields in the COMP_O_ACINTEN register.
6210 //
6211 //*****************************************************************************
6212 #define COMP_ACINTEN_IN1 0x00000002 // Comparator 1 Interrupt Enable
6213 #define COMP_ACINTEN_IN0 0x00000001 // Comparator 0 Interrupt Enable
6214 
6215 //*****************************************************************************
6216 //
6217 // The following are defines for the bit fields in the COMP_O_ACREFCTL
6218 // register.
6219 //
6220 //*****************************************************************************
6221 #define COMP_ACREFCTL_EN 0x00000200 // Resistor Ladder Enable
6222 #define COMP_ACREFCTL_RNG 0x00000100 // Resistor Ladder Range
6223 #define COMP_ACREFCTL_VREF_M 0x0000000F // Resistor Ladder Voltage Ref
6224 #define COMP_ACREFCTL_VREF_S 0
6225 
6226 //*****************************************************************************
6227 //
6228 // The following are defines for the bit fields in the COMP_O_ACSTAT0 register.
6229 //
6230 //*****************************************************************************
6231 #define COMP_ACSTAT0_OVAL 0x00000002 // Comparator Output Value
6232 
6233 //*****************************************************************************
6234 //
6235 // The following are defines for the bit fields in the COMP_O_ACCTL0 register.
6236 //
6237 //*****************************************************************************
6238 #define COMP_ACCTL0_TOEN 0x00000800 // Trigger Output Enable
6239 #define COMP_ACCTL0_ASRCP_M 0x00000600 // Analog Source Positive
6240 #define COMP_ACCTL0_ASRCP_PIN 0x00000000 // Pin value of Cn+
6241 #define COMP_ACCTL0_ASRCP_PIN0 0x00000200 // Pin value of C0+
6242 #define COMP_ACCTL0_ASRCP_REF 0x00000400 // Internal voltage reference
6243 #define COMP_ACCTL0_TSLVAL 0x00000080 // Trigger Sense Level Value
6244 #define COMP_ACCTL0_TSEN_M 0x00000060 // Trigger Sense
6245 #define COMP_ACCTL0_TSEN_LEVEL 0x00000000 // Level sense, see TSLVAL
6246 #define COMP_ACCTL0_TSEN_FALL 0x00000020 // Falling edge
6247 #define COMP_ACCTL0_TSEN_RISE 0x00000040 // Rising edge
6248 #define COMP_ACCTL0_TSEN_BOTH 0x00000060 // Either edge
6249 #define COMP_ACCTL0_ISLVAL 0x00000010 // Interrupt Sense Level Value
6250 #define COMP_ACCTL0_ISEN_M 0x0000000C // Interrupt Sense
6251 #define COMP_ACCTL0_ISEN_LEVEL 0x00000000 // Level sense, see ISLVAL
6252 #define COMP_ACCTL0_ISEN_FALL 0x00000004 // Falling edge
6253 #define COMP_ACCTL0_ISEN_RISE 0x00000008 // Rising edge
6254 #define COMP_ACCTL0_ISEN_BOTH 0x0000000C // Either edge
6255 #define COMP_ACCTL0_CINV 0x00000002 // Comparator Output Invert
6256 
6257 //*****************************************************************************
6258 //
6259 // The following are defines for the bit fields in the COMP_O_ACSTAT1 register.
6260 //
6261 //*****************************************************************************
6262 #define COMP_ACSTAT1_OVAL 0x00000002 // Comparator Output Value
6263 
6264 //*****************************************************************************
6265 //
6266 // The following are defines for the bit fields in the COMP_O_ACCTL1 register.
6267 //
6268 //*****************************************************************************
6269 #define COMP_ACCTL1_TOEN 0x00000800 // Trigger Output Enable
6270 #define COMP_ACCTL1_ASRCP_M 0x00000600 // Analog Source Positive
6271 #define COMP_ACCTL1_ASRCP_PIN 0x00000000 // Pin value of Cn+
6272 #define COMP_ACCTL1_ASRCP_PIN0 0x00000200 // Pin value of C0+
6273 #define COMP_ACCTL1_ASRCP_REF 0x00000400 // Internal voltage reference
6274 #define COMP_ACCTL1_TSLVAL 0x00000080 // Trigger Sense Level Value
6275 #define COMP_ACCTL1_TSEN_M 0x00000060 // Trigger Sense
6276 #define COMP_ACCTL1_TSEN_LEVEL 0x00000000 // Level sense, see TSLVAL
6277 #define COMP_ACCTL1_TSEN_FALL 0x00000020 // Falling edge
6278 #define COMP_ACCTL1_TSEN_RISE 0x00000040 // Rising edge
6279 #define COMP_ACCTL1_TSEN_BOTH 0x00000060 // Either edge
6280 #define COMP_ACCTL1_ISLVAL 0x00000010 // Interrupt Sense Level Value
6281 #define COMP_ACCTL1_ISEN_M 0x0000000C // Interrupt Sense
6282 #define COMP_ACCTL1_ISEN_LEVEL 0x00000000 // Level sense, see ISLVAL
6283 #define COMP_ACCTL1_ISEN_FALL 0x00000004 // Falling edge
6284 #define COMP_ACCTL1_ISEN_RISE 0x00000008 // Rising edge
6285 #define COMP_ACCTL1_ISEN_BOTH 0x0000000C // Either edge
6286 #define COMP_ACCTL1_CINV 0x00000002 // Comparator Output Invert
6287 
6288 //*****************************************************************************
6289 //
6290 // The following are defines for the bit fields in the COMP_O_PP register.
6291 //
6292 //*****************************************************************************
6293 #define COMP_PP_C1O 0x00020000 // Comparator Output 1 Present
6294 #define COMP_PP_C0O 0x00010000 // Comparator Output 0 Present
6295 #define COMP_PP_CMP1 0x00000002 // Comparator 1 Present
6296 #define COMP_PP_CMP0 0x00000001 // Comparator 0 Present
6297 
6298 //*****************************************************************************
6299 //
6300 // The following are defines for the bit fields in the CAN_O_CTL register.
6301 //
6302 //*****************************************************************************
6303 #define CAN_CTL_TEST 0x00000080 // Test Mode Enable
6304 #define CAN_CTL_CCE 0x00000040 // Configuration Change Enable
6305 #define CAN_CTL_DAR 0x00000020 // Disable Automatic-Retransmission
6306 #define CAN_CTL_EIE 0x00000008 // Error Interrupt Enable
6307 #define CAN_CTL_SIE 0x00000004 // Status Interrupt Enable
6308 #define CAN_CTL_IE 0x00000002 // CAN Interrupt Enable
6309 #define CAN_CTL_INIT 0x00000001 // Initialization
6310 
6311 //*****************************************************************************
6312 //
6313 // The following are defines for the bit fields in the CAN_O_STS register.
6314 //
6315 //*****************************************************************************
6316 #define CAN_STS_BOFF 0x00000080 // Bus-Off Status
6317 #define CAN_STS_EWARN 0x00000040 // Warning Status
6318 #define CAN_STS_EPASS 0x00000020 // Error Passive
6319 #define CAN_STS_RXOK 0x00000010 // Received a Message Successfully
6320 #define CAN_STS_TXOK 0x00000008 // Transmitted a Message
6321  // Successfully
6322 #define CAN_STS_LEC_M 0x00000007 // Last Error Code
6323 #define CAN_STS_LEC_NONE 0x00000000 // No Error
6324 #define CAN_STS_LEC_STUFF 0x00000001 // Stuff Error
6325 #define CAN_STS_LEC_FORM 0x00000002 // Format Error
6326 #define CAN_STS_LEC_ACK 0x00000003 // ACK Error
6327 #define CAN_STS_LEC_BIT1 0x00000004 // Bit 1 Error
6328 #define CAN_STS_LEC_BIT0 0x00000005 // Bit 0 Error
6329 #define CAN_STS_LEC_CRC 0x00000006 // CRC Error
6330 #define CAN_STS_LEC_NOEVENT 0x00000007 // No Event
6331 
6332 //*****************************************************************************
6333 //
6334 // The following are defines for the bit fields in the CAN_O_ERR register.
6335 //
6336 //*****************************************************************************
6337 #define CAN_ERR_RP 0x00008000 // Received Error Passive
6338 #define CAN_ERR_REC_M 0x00007F00 // Receive Error Counter
6339 #define CAN_ERR_TEC_M 0x000000FF // Transmit Error Counter
6340 #define CAN_ERR_REC_S 8
6341 #define CAN_ERR_TEC_S 0
6342 
6343 //*****************************************************************************
6344 //
6345 // The following are defines for the bit fields in the CAN_O_BIT register.
6346 //
6347 //*****************************************************************************
6348 #define CAN_BIT_TSEG2_M 0x00007000 // Time Segment after Sample Point
6349 #define CAN_BIT_TSEG1_M 0x00000F00 // Time Segment Before Sample Point
6350 #define CAN_BIT_SJW_M 0x000000C0 // (Re)Synchronization Jump Width
6351 #define CAN_BIT_BRP_M 0x0000003F // Baud Rate Prescaler
6352 #define CAN_BIT_TSEG2_S 12
6353 #define CAN_BIT_TSEG1_S 8
6354 #define CAN_BIT_SJW_S 6
6355 #define CAN_BIT_BRP_S 0
6356 
6357 //*****************************************************************************
6358 //
6359 // The following are defines for the bit fields in the CAN_O_INT register.
6360 //
6361 //*****************************************************************************
6362 #define CAN_INT_INTID_M 0x0000FFFF // Interrupt Identifier
6363 #define CAN_INT_INTID_NONE 0x00000000 // No interrupt pending
6364 #define CAN_INT_INTID_STATUS 0x00008000 // Status Interrupt
6365 
6366 //*****************************************************************************
6367 //
6368 // The following are defines for the bit fields in the CAN_O_TST register.
6369 //
6370 //*****************************************************************************
6371 #define CAN_TST_RX 0x00000080 // Receive Observation
6372 #define CAN_TST_TX_M 0x00000060 // Transmit Control
6373 #define CAN_TST_TX_CANCTL 0x00000000 // CAN Module Control
6374 #define CAN_TST_TX_SAMPLE 0x00000020 // Sample Point
6375 #define CAN_TST_TX_DOMINANT 0x00000040 // Driven Low
6376 #define CAN_TST_TX_RECESSIVE 0x00000060 // Driven High
6377 #define CAN_TST_LBACK 0x00000010 // Loopback Mode
6378 #define CAN_TST_SILENT 0x00000008 // Silent Mode
6379 #define CAN_TST_BASIC 0x00000004 // Basic Mode
6380 
6381 //*****************************************************************************
6382 //
6383 // The following are defines for the bit fields in the CAN_O_BRPE register.
6384 //
6385 //*****************************************************************************
6386 #define CAN_BRPE_BRPE_M 0x0000000F // Baud Rate Prescaler Extension
6387 #define CAN_BRPE_BRPE_S 0
6388 
6389 //*****************************************************************************
6390 //
6391 // The following are defines for the bit fields in the CAN_O_IF1CRQ register.
6392 //
6393 //*****************************************************************************
6394 #define CAN_IF1CRQ_BUSY 0x00008000 // Busy Flag
6395 #define CAN_IF1CRQ_MNUM_M 0x0000003F // Message Number
6396 #define CAN_IF1CRQ_MNUM_S 0
6397 
6398 //*****************************************************************************
6399 //
6400 // The following are defines for the bit fields in the CAN_O_IF1CMSK register.
6401 //
6402 //*****************************************************************************
6403 #define CAN_IF1CMSK_WRNRD 0x00000080 // Write, Not Read
6404 #define CAN_IF1CMSK_MASK 0x00000040 // Access Mask Bits
6405 #define CAN_IF1CMSK_ARB 0x00000020 // Access Arbitration Bits
6406 #define CAN_IF1CMSK_CONTROL 0x00000010 // Access Control Bits
6407 #define CAN_IF1CMSK_CLRINTPND 0x00000008 // Clear Interrupt Pending Bit
6408 #define CAN_IF1CMSK_NEWDAT 0x00000004 // Access New Data
6409 #define CAN_IF1CMSK_TXRQST 0x00000004 // Access Transmission Request
6410 #define CAN_IF1CMSK_DATAA 0x00000002 // Access Data Byte 0 to 3
6411 #define CAN_IF1CMSK_DATAB 0x00000001 // Access Data Byte 4 to 7
6412 
6413 //*****************************************************************************
6414 //
6415 // The following are defines for the bit fields in the CAN_O_IF1MSK1 register.
6416 //
6417 //*****************************************************************************
6418 #define CAN_IF1MSK1_IDMSK_M 0x0000FFFF // Identifier Mask
6419 #define CAN_IF1MSK1_IDMSK_S 0
6420 
6421 //*****************************************************************************
6422 //
6423 // The following are defines for the bit fields in the CAN_O_IF1MSK2 register.
6424 //
6425 //*****************************************************************************
6426 #define CAN_IF1MSK2_MXTD 0x00008000 // Mask Extended Identifier
6427 #define CAN_IF1MSK2_MDIR 0x00004000 // Mask Message Direction
6428 #define CAN_IF1MSK2_IDMSK_M 0x00001FFF // Identifier Mask
6429 #define CAN_IF1MSK2_IDMSK_S 0
6430 
6431 //*****************************************************************************
6432 //
6433 // The following are defines for the bit fields in the CAN_O_IF1ARB1 register.
6434 //
6435 //*****************************************************************************
6436 #define CAN_IF1ARB1_ID_M 0x0000FFFF // Message Identifier
6437 #define CAN_IF1ARB1_ID_S 0
6438 
6439 //*****************************************************************************
6440 //
6441 // The following are defines for the bit fields in the CAN_O_IF1ARB2 register.
6442 //
6443 //*****************************************************************************
6444 #define CAN_IF1ARB2_MSGVAL 0x00008000 // Message Valid
6445 #define CAN_IF1ARB2_XTD 0x00004000 // Extended Identifier
6446 #define CAN_IF1ARB2_DIR 0x00002000 // Message Direction
6447 #define CAN_IF1ARB2_ID_M 0x00001FFF // Message Identifier
6448 #define CAN_IF1ARB2_ID_S 0
6449 
6450 //*****************************************************************************
6451 //
6452 // The following are defines for the bit fields in the CAN_O_IF1MCTL register.
6453 //
6454 //*****************************************************************************
6455 #define CAN_IF1MCTL_NEWDAT 0x00008000 // New Data
6456 #define CAN_IF1MCTL_MSGLST 0x00004000 // Message Lost
6457 #define CAN_IF1MCTL_INTPND 0x00002000 // Interrupt Pending
6458 #define CAN_IF1MCTL_UMASK 0x00001000 // Use Acceptance Mask
6459 #define CAN_IF1MCTL_TXIE 0x00000800 // Transmit Interrupt Enable
6460 #define CAN_IF1MCTL_RXIE 0x00000400 // Receive Interrupt Enable
6461 #define CAN_IF1MCTL_RMTEN 0x00000200 // Remote Enable
6462 #define CAN_IF1MCTL_TXRQST 0x00000100 // Transmit Request
6463 #define CAN_IF1MCTL_EOB 0x00000080 // End of Buffer
6464 #define CAN_IF1MCTL_DLC_M 0x0000000F // Data Length Code
6465 #define CAN_IF1MCTL_DLC_S 0
6466

6673 //*****************************************************************************
6674 //
6675 // The following are defines for the bit fields in the USB_O_FADDR register.
6676 //
6677 //*****************************************************************************
6678 #define USB_FADDR_M 0x0000007F // Function Address
6679 #define USB_FADDR_S 0
6680 
6681 //*****************************************************************************
6682 //
6683 // The following are defines for the bit fields in the USB_O_POWER register.
6684 //
6685 //*****************************************************************************
6686 #define USB_POWER_ISOUP 0x00000080 // Isochronous Update
6687 #define USB_POWER_SOFTCONN 0x00000040 // Soft Connect/Disconnect
6688 #define USB_POWER_RESET 0x00000008 // RESET Signaling
6689 #define USB_POWER_RESUME 0x00000004 // RESUME Signaling
6690 #define USB_POWER_SUSPEND 0x00000002 // SUSPEND Mode
6691 #define USB_POWER_PWRDNPHY 0x00000001 // Power Down PHY
6692 
6693 //*****************************************************************************
6694 //
6695 // The following are defines for the bit fields in the USB_O_TXIS register.
6696 //
6697 //*****************************************************************************
6698 #define USB_TXIS_EP7 0x00000080 // TX Endpoint 7 Interrupt
6699 #define USB_TXIS_EP6 0x00000040 // TX Endpoint 6 Interrupt
6700 #define USB_TXIS_EP5 0x00000020 // TX Endpoint 5 Interrupt
6701 #define USB_TXIS_EP4 0x00000010 // TX Endpoint 4 Interrupt
6702 #define USB_TXIS_EP3 0x00000008 // TX Endpoint 3 Interrupt
6703 #define USB_TXIS_EP2 0x00000004 // TX Endpoint 2 Interrupt
6704 #define USB_TXIS_EP1 0x00000002 // TX Endpoint 1 Interrupt
6705 #define USB_TXIS_EP0 0x00000001 // TX and RX Endpoint 0 Interrupt
6706 
6707 //*****************************************************************************
6708 //
6709 // The following are defines for the bit fields in the USB_O_RXIS register.
6710 //
6711 //*****************************************************************************
6712 #define USB_RXIS_EP7 0x00000080 // RX Endpoint 7 Interrupt
6713 #define USB_RXIS_EP6 0x00000040 // RX Endpoint 6 Interrupt
6714 #define USB_RXIS_EP5 0x00000020 // RX Endpoint 5 Interrupt
6715 #define USB_RXIS_EP4 0x00000010 // RX Endpoint 4 Interrupt
6716 #define USB_RXIS_EP3 0x00000008 // RX Endpoint 3 Interrupt
6717 #define USB_RXIS_EP2 0x00000004 // RX Endpoint 2 Interrupt
6718 #define USB_RXIS_EP1 0x00000002 // RX Endpoint 1 Interrupt
6719 
6720 //*****************************************************************************
6721 //
6722 // The following are defines for the bit fields in the USB_O_TXIE register.
6723 //
6724 //*****************************************************************************
6725 #define USB_TXIE_EP7 0x00000080 // TX Endpoint 7 Interrupt Enable
6726 #define USB_TXIE_EP6 0x00000040 // TX Endpoint 6 Interrupt Enable
6727 #define USB_TXIE_EP5 0x00000020 // TX Endpoint 5 Interrupt Enable
6728 #define USB_TXIE_EP4 0x00000010 // TX Endpoint 4 Interrupt Enable
6729 #define USB_TXIE_EP3 0x00000008 // TX Endpoint 3 Interrupt Enable
6730 #define USB_TXIE_EP2 0x00000004 // TX Endpoint 2 Interrupt Enable
6731 #define USB_TXIE_EP1 0x00000002 // TX Endpoint 1 Interrupt Enable
6732 #define USB_TXIE_EP0 0x00000001 // TX and RX Endpoint 0 Interrupt
6733  // Enable
6734 
6735 //*****************************************************************************
6736 //
6737 // The following are defines for the bit fields in the USB_O_RXIE register.
6738 //
6739 //*****************************************************************************
6740 #define USB_RXIE_EP7 0x00000080 // RX Endpoint 7 Interrupt Enable
6741 #define USB_RXIE_EP6 0x00000040 // RX Endpoint 6 Interrupt Enable
6742 #define USB_RXIE_EP5 0x00000020 // RX Endpoint 5 Interrupt Enable
6743 #define USB_RXIE_EP4 0x00000010 // RX Endpoint 4 Interrupt Enable
6744 #define USB_RXIE_EP3 0x00000008 // RX Endpoint 3 Interrupt Enable
6745 #define USB_RXIE_EP2 0x00000004 // RX Endpoint 2 Interrupt Enable
6746 #define USB_RXIE_EP1 0x00000002 // RX Endpoint 1 Interrupt Enable
6747 
6748 //*****************************************************************************
6749 //
6750 // The following are defines for the bit fields in the USB_O_IS register.
6751 //
6752 //*****************************************************************************
6753 #define USB_IS_VBUSERR 0x00000080 // VBUS Error (OTG only)
6754 #define USB_IS_SESREQ 0x00000040 // SESSION REQUEST (OTG only)
6755 #define USB_IS_DISCON 0x00000020 // Session Disconnect (OTG only)
6756 #define USB_IS_CONN 0x00000010 // Session Connect
6757 #define USB_IS_SOF 0x00000008 // Start of Frame
6758 #define USB_IS_BABBLE 0x00000004 // Babble Detected
6759 #define USB_IS_RESET 0x00000004 // RESET Signaling Detected
6760 #define USB_IS_RESUME 0x00000002 // RESUME Signaling Detected
6761 #define USB_IS_SUSPEND 0x00000001 // SUSPEND Signaling Detected
6762 
6763 //*****************************************************************************
6764 //
6765 // The following are defines for the bit fields in the USB_O_IE register.
6766 //
6767 //*****************************************************************************
6768 #define USB_IE_VBUSERR 0x00000080 // Enable VBUS Error Interrupt (OTG
6769  // only)
6770 #define USB_IE_SESREQ 0x00000040 // Enable Session Request (OTG
6771  // only)
6772 #define USB_IE_DISCON 0x00000020 // Enable Disconnect Interrupt
6773 #define USB_IE_CONN 0x00000010 // Enable Connect Interrupt
6774 #define USB_IE_SOF 0x00000008 // Enable Start-of-Frame Interrupt
6775 #define USB_IE_BABBLE 0x00000004 // Enable Babble Interrupt
6776 #define USB_IE_RESET 0x00000004 // Enable RESET Interrupt
6777 #define USB_IE_RESUME 0x00000002 // Enable RESUME Interrupt
6778 #define USB_IE_SUSPND 0x00000001 // Enable SUSPEND Interrupt
6779 
6780 //*****************************************************************************
6781 //
6782 // The following are defines for the bit fields in the USB_O_FRAME register.
6783 //
6784 //*****************************************************************************
6785 #define USB_FRAME_M 0x000007FF // Frame Number
6786 #define USB_FRAME_S 0
6787 
6788 //*****************************************************************************
6789 //
6790 // The following are defines for the bit fields in the USB_O_EPIDX register.
6791 //
6792 //*****************************************************************************
6793 #define USB_EPIDX_EPIDX_M 0x0000000F // Endpoint Index
6794 #define USB_EPIDX_EPIDX_S 0
6795 
6796 //*****************************************************************************
6797 //
6798 // The following are defines for the bit fields in the USB_O_TEST register.
6799 //
6800 //*****************************************************************************
6801 #define USB_TEST_FORCEH 0x00000080 // Force Host Mode
6802 #define USB_TEST_FIFOACC 0x00000040 // FIFO Access
6803 #define USB_TEST_FORCEFS 0x00000020 // Force Full-Speed Mode
6804 
6805 //*****************************************************************************
6806 //
6807 // The following are defines for the bit fields in the USB_O_FIFO0 register.
6808 //
6809 //*****************************************************************************
6810 #define USB_FIFO0_EPDATA_M 0xFFFFFFFF // Endpoint Data
6811 #define USB_FIFO0_EPDATA_S 0
6812

6814 //

6819 #define USB_FIFO1_EPDATA_S 0
6820

6864 //
6865 //*****************************************************************************
6866 #define USB_FIFO7_EPDATA_M 0xFFFFFFFF // Endpoint Data
6867 #define USB_FIFO7_EPDATA_S 0
6868 
6869 //*****************************************************************************
6870 //
6871 // The following are defines for the bit fields in the USB_O_DEVCTL register.
6872 //
6873 //*****************************************************************************
6874 #define USB_DEVCTL_DEV 0x00000080 // Device Mode (OTG only)
6875 #define USB_DEVCTL_FSDEV 0x00000040 // Full-Speed Device Detected
6876 #define USB_DEVCTL_LSDEV 0x00000020 // Low-Speed Device Detected
6877 #define USB_DEVCTL_VBUS_M 0x00000018 // VBUS Level (OTG only)
6878 #define USB_DEVCTL_VBUS_NONE 0x00000000 // Below SessionEnd
6879 #define USB_DEVCTL_VBUS_SEND 0x00000008 // Above SessionEnd, below AValid
6880 #define USB_DEVCTL_VBUS_AVALID 0x00000010 // Above AValid, below VBUSValid
6881 #define USB_DEVCTL_VBUS_VALID 0x00000018 // Above VBUSValid
6882 #define USB_DEVCTL_HOST 0x00000004 // Host Mode
6883 #define USB_DEVCTL_HOSTREQ 0x00000002 // Host Request (OTG only)
6884 #define USB_DEVCTL_SESSION 0x00000001 // Session Start/End (OTG only)
6885 
6886 //*****************************************************************************
6887 //
6888 // The following are defines for the bit fields in the USB_O_TXFIFOSZ register.
6889 //
6890 //*****************************************************************************
6891 #define USB_TXFIFOSZ_DPB 0x00000010 // Double Packet Buffer Support
6892 #define USB_TXFIFOSZ_SIZE_M 0x0000000F // Max Packet Size
6893 #define USB_TXFIFOSZ_SIZE_8 0x00000000 // 8
6894 #define USB_TXFIFOSZ_SIZE_16 0x00000001 // 16
6895 #define USB_TXFIFOSZ_SIZE_32 0x00000002 // 32
6896 #define USB_TXFIFOSZ_SIZE_64 0x00000003 // 64
6897 #define USB_TXFIFOSZ_SIZE_128 0x00000004 // 128
6898 #define USB_TXFIFOSZ_SIZE_256 0x00000005 // 256
6899 #define USB_TXFIFOSZ_SIZE_512 0x00000006 // 512
6900 #define USB_TXFIFOSZ_SIZE_1024 0x00000007 // 1024
6901 #define USB_TXFIFOSZ_SIZE_2048 0x00000008 // 2048
6902 
6903 //*****************************************************************************
6904 //
6905 // The following are defines for the bit fields in the USB_O_RXFIFOSZ register.
6906 //
6907 //*****************************************************************************
6908 #define USB_RXFIFOSZ_DPB 0x00000010 // Double Packet Buffer Support
6909 #define USB_RXFIFOSZ_SIZE_M 0x0000000F // Max Packet Size
6910 #define USB_RXFIFOSZ_SIZE_8 0x00000000 // 8
6911 #define USB_RXFIFOSZ_SIZE_16 0x00000001 // 16
6912 #define USB_RXFIFOSZ_SIZE_32 0x00000002 // 32
6913 #define USB_RXFIFOSZ_SIZE_64 0x00000003 // 64
6914 #define USB_RXFIFOSZ_SIZE_128 0x00000004 // 128
6915 #define USB_RXFIFOSZ_SIZE_256 0x00000005 // 256
6916 #define USB_RXFIFOSZ_SIZE_512 0x00000006 // 512
6917 #define USB_RXFIFOSZ_SIZE_1024 0x00000007 // 1024
6918 #define USB_RXFIFOSZ_SIZE_2048 0x00000008 // 2048
6919 
6920 //*****************************************************************************
6921 //
6922 // The following are defines for the bit fields in the USB_O_TXFIFOADD
6923 // register.
6924 //
6925 //*****************************************************************************
6926 #define USB_TXFIFOADD_ADDR_M 0x000001FF // Transmit/Receive Start Address
6927 #define USB_TXFIFOADD_ADDR_S 0
6928

6941 //
6942 //*****************************************************************************
6943 #define USB_CONTIM_WTCON_M 0x000000F0 // Connect Wait
6944 #define USB_CONTIM_WTID_M 0x0000000F // Wait ID
6945 #define USB_CONTIM_WTCON_S 4
6946 #define USB_CONTIM_WTID_S 0
6947

6954 #define USB_VPLEN_VPLEN_S 0
6955

6962 #define USB_FSEOF_FSEOFG_S 0
6963

7270 //
7271 // The following are defines for the bit fields in the USB_O_TXFUNCADDR6
7272 // register.
7273 //
7274 //*****************************************************************************
7275 #define USB_TXFUNCADDR6_ADDR_M 0x0000007F // Device Address
7276 #define USB_TXFUNCADDR6_ADDR_S 0
7277 
7278 //*****************************************************************************
7279 //
7280 // The following are defines for the bit fields in the USB_O_TXHUBADDR6
7281 // register.
7282 //
7283 //*****************************************************************************
7284 #define USB_TXHUBADDR6_ADDR_M 0x0000007F // Hub Address
7285 #define USB_TXHUBADDR6_ADDR_S 0
7286

7288 //
7289 // The following are defines for the bit fields in the USB_O_TXHUBPORT6
7290 // register.
7291 //
7292 //*****************************************************************************
7293 #define USB_TXHUBPORT6_PORT_M 0x0000007F // Hub Port
7294 #define USB_TXHUBPORT6_PORT_S 0
7295

7303 #define USB_RXFUNCADDR6_ADDR_S 0

7330 #define USB_TXFUNCADDR7_ADDR_S 0

7355 //*****************************************************************************

7357 #define USB_RXFUNCADDR7_ADDR_S 0

7359 //*****************************************************************************
7360 //

7362 // register.
7363 //
7364 //*****************************************************************************
7365 #define USB_RXHUBADDR7_ADDR_M 0x0000007F // Hub Address
7366 #define USB_RXHUBADDR7_ADDR_S 0
7367 
7368 //*****************************************************************************
7369 //
7370 // The following are defines for the bit fields in the USB_O_RXHUBPORT7
7371 // register.
7372 //
7373 //*****************************************************************************
7374 #define USB_RXHUBPORT7_PORT_M 0x0000007F // Hub Port
7375 #define USB_RXHUBPORT7_PORT_S 0
7376 
7377 //*****************************************************************************
7378 //
7379 // The following are defines for the bit fields in the USB_O_CSRL0 register.
7380 //
7381 //*****************************************************************************
7382 #define USB_CSRL0_NAKTO 0x00000080 // NAK Timeout
7383 #define USB_CSRL0_SETENDC 0x00000080 // Setup End Clear
7384 #define USB_CSRL0_STATUS 0x00000040 // STATUS Packet
7385 #define USB_CSRL0_RXRDYC 0x00000040 // RXRDY Clear
7386 #define USB_CSRL0_REQPKT 0x00000020 // Request Packet
7387 #define USB_CSRL0_STALL 0x00000020 // Send Stall
7388 #define USB_CSRL0_SETEND 0x00000010 // Setup End
7389 #define USB_CSRL0_ERROR 0x00000010 // Error
7390 #define USB_CSRL0_DATAEND 0x00000008 // Data End
7391 #define USB_CSRL0_SETUP 0x00000008 // Setup Packet
7392 #define USB_CSRL0_STALLED 0x00000004 // Endpoint Stalled
7393 #define USB_CSRL0_TXRDY 0x00000002 // Transmit Packet Ready
7394 #define USB_CSRL0_RXRDY 0x00000001 // Receive Packet Ready
7395 
7396 //*****************************************************************************
7397 //
7398 // The following are defines for the bit fields in the USB_O_CSRH0 register.
7399 //
7400 //*****************************************************************************
7401 #define USB_CSRH0_DTWE 0x00000004 // Data Toggle Write Enable
7402 #define USB_CSRH0_DT 0x00000002 // Data Toggle
7403 #define USB_CSRH0_FLUSH 0x00000001 // Flush FIFO
7404 
7405 //*****************************************************************************
7406 //
7407 // The following are defines for the bit fields in the USB_O_COUNT0 register.
7408 //
7409 //*****************************************************************************
7410 #define USB_COUNT0_COUNT_M 0x0000007F // FIFO Count
7411 #define USB_COUNT0_COUNT_S 0
7412 
7413 //*****************************************************************************
7414 //
7415 // The following are defines for the bit fields in the USB_O_TYPE0 register.
7416 //
7417 //*****************************************************************************
7418 #define USB_TYPE0_SPEED_M 0x000000C0 // Operating Speed
7419 #define USB_TYPE0_SPEED_FULL 0x00000080 // Full
7420 #define USB_TYPE0_SPEED_LOW 0x000000C0 // Low
7421 
7422 //*****************************************************************************
7423 //
7424 // The following are defines for the bit fields in the USB_O_NAKLMT register.
7425 //
7426 //*****************************************************************************
7427 #define USB_NAKLMT_NAKLMT_M 0x0000001F // EP0 NAK Limit
7428 #define USB_NAKLMT_NAKLMT_S 0
7429 
7430 //*****************************************************************************
7431 //
7432 // The following are defines for the bit fields in the USB_O_TXMAXP1 register.
7433 //
7434 //*****************************************************************************
7435 #define USB_TXMAXP1_MAXLOAD_M 0x000007FF // Maximum Payload
7436 #define USB_TXMAXP1_MAXLOAD_S 0
7437 
7438 //*****************************************************************************
7439 //
7440 // The following are defines for the bit fields in the USB_O_TXCSRL1 register.
7441 //
7442 //*****************************************************************************
7443 #define USB_TXCSRL1_NAKTO 0x00000080 // NAK Timeout
7444 #define USB_TXCSRL1_CLRDT 0x00000040 // Clear Data Toggle
7445 #define USB_TXCSRL1_STALLED 0x00000020 // Endpoint Stalled
7446 #define USB_TXCSRL1_STALL 0x00000010 // Send STALL
7447 #define USB_TXCSRL1_SETUP 0x00000010 // Setup Packet
7448 #define USB_TXCSRL1_FLUSH 0x00000008 // Flush FIFO
7449 #define USB_TXCSRL1_ERROR 0x00000004 // Error
7450 #define USB_TXCSRL1_UNDRN 0x00000004 // Underrun
7451 #define USB_TXCSRL1_FIFONE 0x00000002 // FIFO Not Empty
7452 #define USB_TXCSRL1_TXRDY 0x00000001 // Transmit Packet Ready
7453 
7454 //*****************************************************************************
7455 //
7456 // The following are defines for the bit fields in the USB_O_TXCSRH1 register.
7457 //
7458 //*****************************************************************************
7459 #define USB_TXCSRH1_AUTOSET 0x00000080 // Auto Set
7460 #define USB_TXCSRH1_ISO 0x00000040 // Isochronous Transfers
7461 #define USB_TXCSRH1_MODE 0x00000020 // Mode
7462 #define USB_TXCSRH1_DMAEN 0x00000010 // DMA Request Enable
7463 #define USB_TXCSRH1_FDT 0x00000008 // Force Data Toggle
7464 #define USB_TXCSRH1_DMAMOD 0x00000004 // DMA Request Mode
7465 #define USB_TXCSRH1_DTWE 0x00000002 // Data Toggle Write Enable
7466 #define USB_TXCSRH1_DT 0x00000001 // Data Toggle
7467

7469 //

7474 #define USB_RXMAXP1_MAXLOAD_S 0
7475

7479 //
7480 //*****************************************************************************

7482 #define USB_RXCSRL1_STALLED 0x00000040 // Endpoint Stalled
7483 #define USB_RXCSRL1_STALL 0x00000020 // Send STALL
7484 #define USB_RXCSRL1_REQPKT 0x00000020 // Request Packet
7485 #define USB_RXCSRL1_FLUSH 0x00000010 // Flush FIFO
7486 #define USB_RXCSRL1_DATAERR 0x00000008 // Data Error
7487 #define USB_RXCSRL1_NAKTO 0x00000008 // NAK Timeout
7488 #define USB_RXCSRL1_OVER 0x00000004 // Overrun
7489 #define USB_RXCSRL1_ERROR 0x00000004 // Error
7490 #define USB_RXCSRL1_FULL 0x00000002 // FIFO Full
7491 #define USB_RXCSRL1_RXRDY 0x00000001 // Receive Packet Ready
7492

7494 //

7496 //
7497 //*****************************************************************************

7499 #define USB_RXCSRH1_AUTORQ 0x00000040 // Auto Request
7500 #define USB_RXCSRH1_ISO 0x00000040 // Isochronous Transfers
7501 #define USB_RXCSRH1_DMAEN 0x00000020 // DMA Request Enable
7502 #define USB_RXCSRH1_DISNYET 0x00000010 // Disable NYET
7503 #define USB_RXCSRH1_PIDERR 0x00000010 // PID Error
7504 #define USB_RXCSRH1_DMAMOD 0x00000008 // DMA Request Mode
7505 #define USB_RXCSRH1_DTWE 0x00000004 // Data Toggle Write Enable
7506 #define USB_RXCSRH1_DT 0x00000002 // Data Toggle
7507

7512 //*****************************************************************************
7513 #define USB_RXCOUNT1_COUNT_M 0x00001FFF // Receive Packet Count
7514 #define USB_RXCOUNT1_COUNT_S 0
7515 
7516 //*****************************************************************************
7517 //
7518 // The following are defines for the bit fields in the USB_O_TXTYPE1 register.
7519 //
7520 //*****************************************************************************

7522 #define USB_TXTYPE1_SPEED_DFLT 0x00000000 // Default
7523 #define USB_TXTYPE1_SPEED_FULL 0x00000080 // Full
7524 #define USB_TXTYPE1_SPEED_LOW 0x000000C0 // Low
7525 #define USB_TXTYPE1_PROTO_M 0x00000030 // Protocol
7526 #define USB_TXTYPE1_PROTO_CTRL 0x00000000 // Control
7527 #define USB_TXTYPE1_PROTO_ISOC 0x00000010 // Isochronous
7528 #define USB_TXTYPE1_PROTO_BULK 0x00000020 // Bulk
7529 #define USB_TXTYPE1_PROTO_INT 0x00000030 // Interrupt
7530 #define USB_TXTYPE1_TEP_M 0x0000000F // Target Endpoint Number
7531 #define USB_TXTYPE1_TEP_S 0
7532

7536 // register.

7540  0x000000FF // NAK Limit
7541 #define USB_TXINTERVAL1_TXPOLL_M \
7542  0x000000FF // TX Polling
7543 #define USB_TXINTERVAL1_TXPOLL_S \

7546  0

7796 //
7797 //*****************************************************************************
7798 #define USB_RXCSRH3_AUTOCL 0x00000080 // Auto Clear
7799 #define USB_RXCSRH3_AUTORQ 0x00000040 // Auto Request
7800 #define USB_RXCSRH3_ISO 0x00000040 // Isochronous Transfers
7801 #define USB_RXCSRH3_DMAEN 0x00000020 // DMA Request Enable
7802 #define USB_RXCSRH3_DISNYET 0x00000010 // Disable NYET
7803 #define USB_RXCSRH3_PIDERR 0x00000010 // PID Error
7804 #define USB_RXCSRH3_DMAMOD 0x00000008 // DMA Request Mode
7805 #define USB_RXCSRH3_DTWE 0x00000004 // Data Toggle Write Enable
7806 #define USB_RXCSRH3_DT 0x00000002 // Data Toggle
7807 
7808 //*****************************************************************************
7809 //
7810 // The following are defines for the bit fields in the USB_O_RXCOUNT3 register.
7811 //
7812 //*****************************************************************************
7813 #define USB_RXCOUNT3_COUNT_M 0x00001FFF // Receive Packet Count
7814 #define USB_RXCOUNT3_COUNT_S 0
7815 
7816 //*****************************************************************************
7817 //
7818 // The following are defines for the bit fields in the USB_O_TXTYPE3 register.
7819 //
7820 //*****************************************************************************
7821 #define USB_TXTYPE3_SPEED_M 0x000000C0 // Operating Speed
7822 #define USB_TXTYPE3_SPEED_DFLT 0x00000000 // Default
7823 #define USB_TXTYPE3_SPEED_FULL 0x00000080 // Full
7824 #define USB_TXTYPE3_SPEED_LOW 0x000000C0 // Low
7825 #define USB_TXTYPE3_PROTO_M 0x00000030 // Protocol
7826 #define USB_TXTYPE3_PROTO_CTRL 0x00000000 // Control
7827 #define USB_TXTYPE3_PROTO_ISOC 0x00000010 // Isochronous
7828 #define USB_TXTYPE3_PROTO_BULK 0x00000020 // Bulk
7829 #define USB_TXTYPE3_PROTO_INT 0x00000030 // Interrupt
7830 #define USB_TXTYPE3_TEP_M 0x0000000F // Target Endpoint Number
7831 #define USB_TXTYPE3_TEP_S 0
7832 
7833 //*****************************************************************************
7834 //
7835 // The following are defines for the bit fields in the USB_O_TXINTERVAL3
7836 // register.
7837 //
7838 //*****************************************************************************
7839 #define USB_TXINTERVAL3_TXPOLL_M \
7840  0x000000FF // TX Polling
7841 #define USB_TXINTERVAL3_NAKLMT_M \
7842  0x000000FF // NAK Limit
7843 #define USB_TXINTERVAL3_TXPOLL_S \
7844  0
7845 #define USB_TXINTERVAL3_NAKLMT_S \
7846  0
7847 
7848 //*****************************************************************************
7849 //
7850 // The following are defines for the bit fields in the USB_O_RXTYPE3 register.
7851 //
7852 //*****************************************************************************
7853 #define USB_RXTYPE3_SPEED_M 0x000000C0 // Operating Speed
7854 #define USB_RXTYPE3_SPEED_DFLT 0x00000000 // Default
7855 #define USB_RXTYPE3_SPEED_FULL 0x00000080 // Full
7856 #define USB_RXTYPE3_SPEED_LOW 0x000000C0 // Low
7857 #define USB_RXTYPE3_PROTO_M 0x00000030 // Protocol
7858 #define USB_RXTYPE3_PROTO_CTRL 0x00000000 // Control
7859 #define USB_RXTYPE3_PROTO_ISOC 0x00000010 // Isochronous
7860 #define USB_RXTYPE3_PROTO_BULK 0x00000020 // Bulk
7861 #define USB_RXTYPE3_PROTO_INT 0x00000030 // Interrupt
7862 #define USB_RXTYPE3_TEP_M 0x0000000F // Target Endpoint Number
7863 #define USB_RXTYPE3_TEP_S 0

7881 //
7882 // The following are defines for the bit fields in the USB_O_TXMAXP4 register.
7883 //
7884 //*****************************************************************************
7885 #define USB_TXMAXP4_MAXLOAD_M 0x000007FF // Maximum Payload
7886 #define USB_TXMAXP4_MAXLOAD_S 0
7887 
7888 //*****************************************************************************
7889 //
7890 // The following are defines for the bit fields in the USB_O_TXCSRL4 register.
7891 //
7892 //*****************************************************************************
7893 #define USB_TXCSRL4_NAKTO 0x00000080 // NAK Timeout
7894 #define USB_TXCSRL4_CLRDT 0x00000040 // Clear Data Toggle
7895 #define USB_TXCSRL4_STALLED 0x00000020 // Endpoint Stalled
7896 #define USB_TXCSRL4_SETUP 0x00000010 // Setup Packet
7897 #define USB_TXCSRL4_STALL 0x00000010 // Send STALL
7898 #define USB_TXCSRL4_FLUSH 0x00000008 // Flush FIFO
7899 #define USB_TXCSRL4_ERROR 0x00000004 // Error
7900 #define USB_TXCSRL4_UNDRN 0x00000004 // Underrun
7901 #define USB_TXCSRL4_FIFONE 0x00000002 // FIFO Not Empty
7902 #define USB_TXCSRL4_TXRDY 0x00000001 // Transmit Packet Ready
7903 
7904 //*****************************************************************************
7905 //
7906 // The following are defines for the bit fields in the USB_O_TXCSRH4 register.
7907 //
7908 //*****************************************************************************

7910 #define USB_TXCSRH4_ISO 0x00000040 // Isochronous Transfers

7915 #define USB_TXCSRH4_DTWE 0x00000002 // Data Toggle Write Enable
7916 #define USB_TXCSRH4_DT 0x00000001 // Data Toggle

7934 #define USB_RXCSRL4_REQPKT 0x00000020 // Request Packet
7935 #define USB_RXCSRL4_FLUSH 0x00000010 // Flush FIFO

8296  0
8297 
8298 //*****************************************************************************
8299 //
8300 // The following are defines for the bit fields in the USB_O_RXTYPE6 register.
8301 //
8302 //*****************************************************************************
8303 #define USB_RXTYPE6_SPEED_M 0x000000C0 // Operating Speed
8304 #define USB_RXTYPE6_SPEED_DFLT 0x00000000 // Default
8305 #define USB_RXTYPE6_SPEED_FULL 0x00000080 // Full
8306 #define USB_RXTYPE6_SPEED_LOW 0x000000C0 // Low
8307 #define USB_RXTYPE6_PROTO_M 0x00000030 // Protocol
8308 #define USB_RXTYPE6_PROTO_CTRL 0x00000000 // Control
8309 #define USB_RXTYPE6_PROTO_ISOC 0x00000010 // Isochronous
8310 #define USB_RXTYPE6_PROTO_BULK 0x00000020 // Bulk
8311 #define USB_RXTYPE6_PROTO_INT 0x00000030 // Interrupt
8312 #define USB_RXTYPE6_TEP_M 0x0000000F // Target Endpoint Number
8313 #define USB_RXTYPE6_TEP_S 0
8314 
8315 //*****************************************************************************
8316 //
8317 // The following are defines for the bit fields in the USB_O_RXINTERVAL6
8318 // register.
8319 //
8320 //*****************************************************************************
8321 #define USB_RXINTERVAL6_TXPOLL_M \
8322  0x000000FF // RX Polling
8323 #define USB_RXINTERVAL6_NAKLMT_M \
8324  0x000000FF // NAK Limit
8325 #define USB_RXINTERVAL6_NAKLMT_S \
8326  0
8327 #define USB_RXINTERVAL6_TXPOLL_S \
8328  0
8329 
8330 //*****************************************************************************
8331 //
8332 // The following are defines for the bit fields in the USB_O_TXMAXP7 register.
8333 //
8334 //*****************************************************************************
8335 #define USB_TXMAXP7_MAXLOAD_M 0x000007FF // Maximum Payload
8336 #define USB_TXMAXP7_MAXLOAD_S 0
8337 
8338 //*****************************************************************************
8339 //
8340 // The following are defines for the bit fields in the USB_O_TXCSRL7 register.
8341 //
8342 //*****************************************************************************
8343 #define USB_TXCSRL7_NAKTO 0x00000080 // NAK Timeout
8344 #define USB_TXCSRL7_CLRDT 0x00000040 // Clear Data Toggle
8345 #define USB_TXCSRL7_STALLED 0x00000020 // Endpoint Stalled
8346 #define USB_TXCSRL7_STALL 0x00000010 // Send STALL
8347 #define USB_TXCSRL7_SETUP 0x00000010 // Setup Packet
8348 #define USB_TXCSRL7_FLUSH 0x00000008 // Flush FIFO
8349 #define USB_TXCSRL7_ERROR 0x00000004 // Error
8350 #define USB_TXCSRL7_UNDRN 0x00000004 // Underrun
8351 #define USB_TXCSRL7_FIFONE 0x00000002 // FIFO Not Empty
8352 #define USB_TXCSRL7_TXRDY 0x00000001 // Transmit Packet Ready
8353 
8354 //*****************************************************************************
8355 //
8356 // The following are defines for the bit fields in the USB_O_TXCSRH7 register.
8357 //
8358 //*****************************************************************************
8359 #define USB_TXCSRH7_AUTOSET 0x00000080 // Auto Set
8360 #define USB_TXCSRH7_ISO 0x00000040 // Isochronous Transfers
8361 #define USB_TXCSRH7_MODE 0x00000020 // Mode
8362 #define USB_TXCSRH7_DMAEN 0x00000010 // DMA Request Enable
8363 #define USB_TXCSRH7_FDT 0x00000008 // Force Data Toggle
8364 #define USB_TXCSRH7_DMAMOD 0x00000004 // DMA Request Mode
8365 #define USB_TXCSRH7_DTWE 0x00000002 // Data Toggle Write Enable
8366 #define USB_TXCSRH7_DT 0x00000001 // Data Toggle
8367 
8368 //*****************************************************************************
8369 //
8370 // The following are defines for the bit fields in the USB_O_RXMAXP7 register.
8371 //
8372 //*****************************************************************************
8373 #define USB_RXMAXP7_MAXLOAD_M 0x000007FF // Maximum Payload
8374 #define USB_RXMAXP7_MAXLOAD_S 0
8375 
8376 //*****************************************************************************
8377 //
8378 // The following are defines for the bit fields in the USB_O_RXCSRL7 register.
8379 //
8380 //*****************************************************************************
8381 #define USB_RXCSRL7_CLRDT 0x00000080 // Clear Data Toggle
8382 #define USB_RXCSRL7_STALLED 0x00000040 // Endpoint Stalled
8383 #define USB_RXCSRL7_REQPKT 0x00000020 // Request Packet
8384 #define USB_RXCSRL7_STALL 0x00000020 // Send STALL
8385 #define USB_RXCSRL7_FLUSH 0x00000010 // Flush FIFO
8386 #define USB_RXCSRL7_DATAERR 0x00000008 // Data Error
8387 #define USB_RXCSRL7_NAKTO 0x00000008 // NAK Timeout
8388 #define USB_RXCSRL7_ERROR 0x00000004 // Error
8389 #define USB_RXCSRL7_OVER 0x00000004 // Overrun
8390 #define USB_RXCSRL7_FULL 0x00000002 // FIFO Full
8391 #define USB_RXCSRL7_RXRDY 0x00000001 // Receive Packet Ready
8392 
8393 //*****************************************************************************
8394 //
8395 // The following are defines for the bit fields in the USB_O_RXCSRH7 register.
8396 //
8397 //*****************************************************************************
8398 #define USB_RXCSRH7_AUTOCL 0x00000080 // Auto Clear
8399 #define USB_RXCSRH7_ISO 0x00000040 // Isochronous Transfers
8400 #define USB_RXCSRH7_AUTORQ 0x00000040 // Auto Request
8401 #define USB_RXCSRH7_DMAEN 0x00000020 // DMA Request Enable
8402 #define USB_RXCSRH7_PIDERR 0x00000010 // PID Error
8403 #define USB_RXCSRH7_DISNYET 0x00000010 // Disable NYET
8404 #define USB_RXCSRH7_DMAMOD 0x00000008 // DMA Request Mode
8405 #define USB_RXCSRH7_DTWE 0x00000004 // Data Toggle Write Enable
8406 #define USB_RXCSRH7_DT 0x00000002 // Data Toggle
8407

8550  // Disable

8552  // Disable
8553 #define USB_RXDPKTBUFDIS_EP5 0x00000020 // EP5 RX Double-Packet Buffer
8554  // Disable
8555 #define USB_RXDPKTBUFDIS_EP4 0x00000010 // EP4 RX Double-Packet Buffer
8556  // Disable

8558  // Disable

8560  // Disable

8562  // Disable
8563

8567 // register.
8568 //
8569 //*****************************************************************************

8571  // Disable
8572 #define USB_TXDPKTBUFDIS_EP6 0x00000040 // EP6 TX Double-Packet Buffer
8573  // Disable
8574 #define USB_TXDPKTBUFDIS_EP5 0x00000020 // EP5 TX Double-Packet Buffer
8575  // Disable
8576 #define USB_TXDPKTBUFDIS_EP4 0x00000010 // EP4 TX Double-Packet Buffer
8577  // Disable

8585 //*****************************************************************************
8586 //
8587 // The following are defines for the bit fields in the USB_O_EPC register.
8588 //
8589 //*****************************************************************************
8590 #define USB_EPC_PFLTACT_M 0x00000300 // Power Fault Action
8591 #define USB_EPC_PFLTACT_UNCHG 0x00000000 // Unchanged
8592 #define USB_EPC_PFLTACT_TRIS 0x00000100 // Tristate
8593 #define USB_EPC_PFLTACT_LOW 0x00000200 // Low
8594 #define USB_EPC_PFLTACT_HIGH 0x00000300 // High
8595 #define USB_EPC_PFLTAEN 0x00000040 // Power Fault Action Enable
8596 #define USB_EPC_PFLTSEN_HIGH 0x00000020 // Power Fault Sense
8597 #define USB_EPC_PFLTEN 0x00000010 // Power Fault Input Enable
8598 #define USB_EPC_EPENDE 0x00000004 // EPEN Drive Enable
8599 #define USB_EPC_EPEN_M 0x00000003 // External Power Supply Enable
8600  // Configuration
8601 #define USB_EPC_EPEN_LOW 0x00000000 // Power Enable Active Low
8602 #define USB_EPC_EPEN_HIGH 0x00000001 // Power Enable Active High
8603 #define USB_EPC_EPEN_VBLOW 0x00000002 // Power Enable High if VBUS Low
8604  // (OTG only)
8605 #define USB_EPC_EPEN_VBHIGH 0x00000003 // Power Enable High if VBUS High
8606  // (OTG only)
8607

8712 //*****************************************************************************
8713 //
8714 // The following are defines for the bit fields in the USB_O_DMASEL register.
8715 //
8716 //*****************************************************************************
8717 #define USB_DMASEL_DMACTX_M 0x00F00000 // DMA C TX Select
8718 #define USB_DMASEL_DMACRX_M 0x000F0000 // DMA C RX Select
8719 #define USB_DMASEL_DMABTX_M 0x0000F000 // DMA B TX Select
8720 #define USB_DMASEL_DMABRX_M 0x00000F00 // DMA B RX Select
8721 #define USB_DMASEL_DMAATX_M 0x000000F0 // DMA A TX Select
8722 #define USB_DMASEL_DMAARX_M 0x0000000F // DMA A RX Select
8723 #define USB_DMASEL_DMACTX_S 20
8724 #define USB_DMASEL_DMACRX_S 16
8725 #define USB_DMASEL_DMABTX_S 12
8726 #define USB_DMASEL_DMABRX_S 8
8727 #define USB_DMASEL_DMAATX_S 4
8728 #define USB_DMASEL_DMAARX_S 0
8729 
8730 //*****************************************************************************
8731 //
8732 // The following are defines for the bit fields in the USB_O_PP register.
8733 //
8734 //*****************************************************************************
8735 #define USB_PP_ECNT_M 0x0000FF00 // Endpoint Count
8736 #define USB_PP_USB_M 0x000000C0 // USB Capability
8737 #define USB_PP_USB_DEVICE 0x00000040 // DEVICE
8738 #define USB_PP_USB_HOSTDEVICE 0x00000080 // HOST
8739 #define USB_PP_USB_OTG 0x000000C0 // OTG
8740 #define USB_PP_PHY 0x00000010 // PHY Present
8741 #define USB_PP_TYPE_M 0x0000000F // Controller Type
8742 #define USB_PP_TYPE_0 0x00000000 // The first-generation USB
8743  // controller
8744 #define USB_PP_ECNT_S 8
8745

8754 #define EEPROM_EESIZE_WORDCNT_S 0

8795 //*****************************************************************************
8796 //
8797 // The following are defines for the bit fields in the EEPROM_EEDONE register.
8798 //
8799 //*****************************************************************************
8800 #define EEPROM_EEDONE_WRBUSY 0x00000020 // Write Busy
8801 #define EEPROM_EEDONE_NOPERM 0x00000010 // Write Without Permission
8802 #define EEPROM_EEDONE_WKCOPY 0x00000008 // Working on a Copy
8803 #define EEPROM_EEDONE_WKERASE 0x00000004 // Working on an Erase
8804 #define EEPROM_EEDONE_WORKING 0x00000001 // EEPROM Working
8805 
8806 //*****************************************************************************
8807 //
8808 // The following are defines for the bit fields in the EEPROM_EESUPP register.
8809 //
8810 //*****************************************************************************
8811 #define EEPROM_EESUPP_PRETRY 0x00000008 // Programming Must Be Retried
8812 #define EEPROM_EESUPP_ERETRY 0x00000004 // Erase Must Be Retried
8813 
8814 //*****************************************************************************
8815 //
8816 // The following are defines for the bit fields in the EEPROM_EEUNLOCK
8817 // register.
8818 //
8819 //*****************************************************************************
8820 #define EEPROM_EEUNLOCK_UNLOCK_M \
8821  0xFFFFFFFF // EEPROM Unlock
8822 
8823 //*****************************************************************************
8824 //
8825 // The following are defines for the bit fields in the EEPROM_EEPROT register.
8826 //
8827 //*****************************************************************************
8828 #define EEPROM_EEPROT_ACC 0x00000008 // Access Control
8829 #define EEPROM_EEPROT_PROT_M 0x00000007 // Protection Control
8830 #define EEPROM_EEPROT_PROT_RWNPW \
8831  0x00000000 // This setting is the default. If
8832  // there is no password, the block
8833  // is not protected and is readable
8834  // and writable
8835 #define EEPROM_EEPROT_PROT_RWPW 0x00000001 // If there is a password, the
8836  // block is readable or writable
8837  // only when unlocked
8838 #define EEPROM_EEPROT_PROT_RONPW \
8839  0x00000002 // If there is no password, the
8840  // block is readable, not writable
8841 
8842 //*****************************************************************************
8843 //
8844 // The following are defines for the bit fields in the EEPROM_EEPASS0 register.
8845 //
8846 //*****************************************************************************
8847 #define EEPROM_EEPASS0_PASS_M 0xFFFFFFFF // Password
8848 #define EEPROM_EEPASS0_PASS_S 0
8849 
8850 //*****************************************************************************
8851 //
8852 // The following are defines for the bit fields in the EEPROM_EEPASS1 register.
8853 //
8854 //*****************************************************************************
8855 #define EEPROM_EEPASS1_PASS_M 0xFFFFFFFF // Password
8856 #define EEPROM_EEPASS1_PASS_S 0
8857 
8858 //*****************************************************************************
8859 //
8860 // The following are defines for the bit fields in the EEPROM_EEPASS2 register.
8861 //
8862 //*****************************************************************************
8863 #define EEPROM_EEPASS2_PASS_M 0xFFFFFFFF // Password
8864 #define EEPROM_EEPASS2_PASS_S 0
8865 
8866 //*****************************************************************************
8867 //
8868 // The following are defines for the bit fields in the EEPROM_EEINT register.
8869 //
8870 //*****************************************************************************
8871 #define EEPROM_EEINT_INT 0x00000001 // Interrupt Enable
8872 
8873 //*****************************************************************************
8874 //
8875 // The following are defines for the bit fields in the EEPROM_EEHIDE register.
8876 //
8877 //*****************************************************************************
8878 #define EEPROM_EEHIDE_HN_M 0xFFFFFFFE // Hide Block
8879 
8880 //*****************************************************************************
8881 //
8882 // The following are defines for the bit fields in the EEPROM_EEDBGME register.
8883 //
8884 //*****************************************************************************

8886 #define EEPROM_EEDBGME_ME 0x00000001 // Mass Erase
8887 #define EEPROM_EEDBGME_KEY_S 16
8888

8890 //

8895 #define EEPROM_PP_SIZE_S 0
8896 
8897 //*****************************************************************************
8898 //
8899 // The following are defines for the bit fields in the SYSEXC_RIS register.
8900 //
8901 //*****************************************************************************
8902 #define SYSEXC_RIS_FPIXCRIS 0x00000020 // Floating-Point Inexact Exception
8903  // Raw Interrupt Status
8904 #define SYSEXC_RIS_FPOFCRIS 0x00000010 // Floating-Point Overflow
8905  // Exception Raw Interrupt Status
8906 #define SYSEXC_RIS_FPUFCRIS 0x00000008 // Floating-Point Underflow
8907  // Exception Raw Interrupt Status
8908 #define SYSEXC_RIS_FPIOCRIS 0x00000004 // Floating-Point Invalid Operation
8909  // Raw Interrupt Status
8910 #define SYSEXC_RIS_FPDZCRIS 0x00000002 // Floating-Point Divide By 0
8911  // Exception Raw Interrupt Status
8912 #define SYSEXC_RIS_FPIDCRIS 0x00000001 // Floating-Point Input Denormal
8913  // Exception Raw Interrupt Status
8914 
8915 //*****************************************************************************
8916 //
8917 // The following are defines for the bit fields in the SYSEXC_IM register.
8918 //
8919 //*****************************************************************************
8920 #define SYSEXC_IM_FPIXCIM 0x00000020 // Floating-Point Inexact Exception
8921  // Interrupt Mask
8922 #define SYSEXC_IM_FPOFCIM 0x00000010 // Floating-Point Overflow
8923  // Exception Interrupt Mask
8924 #define SYSEXC_IM_FPUFCIM 0x00000008 // Floating-Point Underflow
8925  // Exception Interrupt Mask
8926 #define SYSEXC_IM_FPIOCIM 0x00000004 // Floating-Point Invalid Operation
8927  // Interrupt Mask
8928 #define SYSEXC_IM_FPDZCIM 0x00000002 // Floating-Point Divide By 0
8929  // Exception Interrupt Mask
8930 #define SYSEXC_IM_FPIDCIM 0x00000001 // Floating-Point Input Denormal
8931  // Exception Interrupt Mask
8932 
8933 //*****************************************************************************
8934 //
8935 // The following are defines for the bit fields in the SYSEXC_MIS register.
8936 //
8937 //*****************************************************************************
8938 #define SYSEXC_MIS_FPIXCMIS 0x00000020 // Floating-Point Inexact Exception
8939  // Masked Interrupt Status
8940 #define SYSEXC_MIS_FPOFCMIS 0x00000010 // Floating-Point Overflow
8941  // Exception Masked Interrupt
8942  // Status
8943 #define SYSEXC_MIS_FPUFCMIS 0x00000008 // Floating-Point Underflow
8944  // Exception Masked Interrupt
8945  // Status
8946 #define SYSEXC_MIS_FPIOCMIS 0x00000004 // Floating-Point Invalid Operation
8947  // Masked Interrupt Status
8948 #define SYSEXC_MIS_FPDZCMIS 0x00000002 // Floating-Point Divide By 0
8949  // Exception Masked Interrupt
8950  // Status
8951 #define SYSEXC_MIS_FPIDCMIS 0x00000001 // Floating-Point Input Denormal
8952  // Exception Masked Interrupt
8953  // Status
8954 
8955 //*****************************************************************************
8956 //

8958 //
8959 //*****************************************************************************
8960 #define SYSEXC_IC_FPIXCIC 0x00000020 // Floating-Point Inexact Exception
8961  // Interrupt Clear
8962 #define SYSEXC_IC_FPOFCIC 0x00000010 // Floating-Point Overflow
8963  // Exception Interrupt Clear
8964 #define SYSEXC_IC_FPUFCIC 0x00000008 // Floating-Point Underflow
8965  // Exception Interrupt Clear
8966 #define SYSEXC_IC_FPIOCIC 0x00000004 // Floating-Point Invalid Operation
8967  // Interrupt Clear
8968 #define SYSEXC_IC_FPDZCIC 0x00000002 // Floating-Point Divide By 0
8969  // Exception Interrupt Clear
8970 #define SYSEXC_IC_FPIDCIC 0x00000001 // Floating-Point Input Denormal
8971  // Exception Interrupt Clear
8972

8997 //*****************************************************************************
8998 //
8999 // The following are defines for the bit fields in the HIB_CTL register.
9000 //
9001 //*****************************************************************************
9002 #define HIB_CTL_WRC 0x80000000 // Write Complete/Capable
9003 #define HIB_CTL_OSCDRV 0x00020000 // Oscillator Drive Capability
9004 #define HIB_CTL_OSCBYP 0x00010000 // Oscillator Bypass
9005 #define HIB_CTL_VBATSEL_M 0x00006000 // Select for Low-Battery
9006  // Comparator
9007 #define HIB_CTL_VBATSEL_1_9V 0x00000000 // 1.9 Volts
9008 #define HIB_CTL_VBATSEL_2_1V 0x00002000 // 2.1 Volts (default)
9009 #define HIB_CTL_VBATSEL_2_3V 0x00004000 // 2.3 Volts
9010 #define HIB_CTL_VBATSEL_2_5V 0x00006000 // 2.5 Volts
9011 #define HIB_CTL_BATCHK 0x00000400 // Check Battery Status
9012 #define HIB_CTL_BATWKEN 0x00000200 // Wake on Low Battery
9013 #define HIB_CTL_VDD3ON 0x00000100 // VDD Powered
9014 #define HIB_CTL_VABORT 0x00000080 // Power Cut Abort Enable
9015 #define HIB_CTL_CLK32EN 0x00000040 // Clocking Enable
9016 #define HIB_CTL_PINWEN 0x00000010 // External Wake Pin Enable
9017 #define HIB_CTL_RTCWEN 0x00000008 // RTC Wake-up Enable
9018 #define HIB_CTL_HIBREQ 0x00000002 // Hibernation Request
9019 #define HIB_CTL_RTCEN 0x00000001 // RTC Timer Enable
9020 
9021 //*****************************************************************************
9022 //
9023 // The following are defines for the bit fields in the HIB_IM register.
9024 //
9025 //*****************************************************************************
9026 #define HIB_IM_WC 0x00000010 // External Write Complete/Capable
9027  // Interrupt Mask
9028 #define HIB_IM_EXTW 0x00000008 // External Wake-Up Interrupt Mask
9029 #define HIB_IM_LOWBAT 0x00000004 // Low Battery Voltage Interrupt
9030  // Mask
9031 #define HIB_IM_RTCALT0 0x00000001 // RTC Alert 0 Interrupt Mask
9032

9039  // Interrupt Status

9041  // Status

9241 #define FLASH_BOOTCFG_PORT_H 0x0000E000 // Port H

9243 #define FLASH_BOOTCFG_PIN_0 0x00000000 // Pin 0
9244 #define FLASH_BOOTCFG_PIN_1 0x00000400 // Pin 1

9246 #define FLASH_BOOTCFG_PIN_3 0x00000C00 // Pin 3
9247 #define FLASH_BOOTCFG_PIN_4 0x00001000 // Pin 4
9248 #define FLASH_BOOTCFG_PIN_5 0x00001400 // Pin 5
9249 #define FLASH_BOOTCFG_PIN_6 0x00001800 // Pin 6
9250 #define FLASH_BOOTCFG_PIN_7 0x00001C00 // Pin 7
9251 #define FLASH_BOOTCFG_POL 0x00000200 // Boot GPIO Polarity
9252 #define FLASH_BOOTCFG_EN 0x00000100 // Boot GPIO Enable
9253 #define FLASH_BOOTCFG_KEY 0x00000010 // KEY Select

9289 //*****************************************************************************
9290 //
9291 // The following are defines for the bit fields in the SYSCTL_DID0 register.
9292 //
9293 //*****************************************************************************
9294 #define SYSCTL_DID0_VER_M 0x70000000 // DID0 Version
9295 #define SYSCTL_DID0_VER_1 0x10000000 // Second version of the DID0
9296  // register format.
9297 #define SYSCTL_DID0_CLASS_M 0x00FF0000 // Device Class
9298 #define SYSCTL_DID0_CLASS_TM4C123 \
9299  0x00050000 // Tiva TM4C123x and TM4E123x
9300  // microcontrollers
9301 #define SYSCTL_DID0_MAJ_M 0x0000FF00 // Major Revision
9302 #define SYSCTL_DID0_MAJ_REVA 0x00000000 // Revision A (initial device)
9303 #define SYSCTL_DID0_MAJ_REVB 0x00000100 // Revision B (first base layer
9304  // revision)
9305 #define SYSCTL_DID0_MAJ_REVC 0x00000200 // Revision C (second base layer
9306  // revision)
9307 #define SYSCTL_DID0_MIN_M 0x000000FF // Minor Revision
9308 #define SYSCTL_DID0_MIN_0 0x00000000 // Initial device, or a major
9309  // revision update
9310 #define SYSCTL_DID0_MIN_1 0x00000001 // First metal layer change
9311 #define SYSCTL_DID0_MIN_2 0x00000002 // Second metal layer change
9312 
9313 //*****************************************************************************
9314 //
9315 // The following are defines for the bit fields in the SYSCTL_DID1 register.
9316 //
9317 //*****************************************************************************
9318 #define SYSCTL_DID1_VER_M 0xF0000000 // DID1 Version
9319 #define SYSCTL_DID1_VER_1 0x10000000 // fury_ib
9320 #define SYSCTL_DID1_FAM_M 0x0F000000 // Family
9321 #define SYSCTL_DID1_FAM_TIVA 0x00000000 // Tiva family of microcontollers
9322 #define SYSCTL_DID1_PRTNO_M 0x00FF0000 // Part Number
9323 #define SYSCTL_DID1_PRTNO_TM4C123GH6PM \
9324  0x00A10000 // TM4C123GH6PM
9325 #define SYSCTL_DID1_PINCNT_M 0x0000E000 // Package Pin Count
9326 #define SYSCTL_DID1_PINCNT_100 0x00004000 // 100-pin LQFP package
9327 #define SYSCTL_DID1_PINCNT_64 0x00006000 // 64-pin LQFP package
9328 #define SYSCTL_DID1_PINCNT_144 0x00008000 // 144-pin LQFP package
9329 #define SYSCTL_DID1_PINCNT_157 0x0000A000 // 157-pin BGA package
9330 #define SYSCTL_DID1_PINCNT_128 0x0000C000 // 128-pin TQFP package
9331 #define SYSCTL_DID1_TEMP_M 0x000000E0 // Temperature Range
9332 #define SYSCTL_DID1_TEMP_I 0x00000020 // Industrial temperature range
9333 #define SYSCTL_DID1_TEMP_E 0x00000040 // Extended temperature range
9334 #define SYSCTL_DID1_TEMP_IE 0x00000060 // Available in both industrial
9335  // temperature range (-40C to 85C)
9336  // and extended temperature range
9337  // (-40C to 105C) devices. See
9338 #define SYSCTL_DID1_PKG_M 0x00000018 // Package Type
9339 #define SYSCTL_DID1_PKG_QFP 0x00000008 // QFP package
9340 #define SYSCTL_DID1_PKG_BGA 0x00000010 // BGA package
9341 #define SYSCTL_DID1_ROHS 0x00000004 // RoHS-Compliance
9342 #define SYSCTL_DID1_QUAL_M 0x00000003 // Qualification Status
9343 #define SYSCTL_DID1_QUAL_ES 0x00000000 // Engineering Sample (unqualified)
9344 #define SYSCTL_DID1_QUAL_PP 0x00000001 // Pilot Production (unqualified)
9345 #define SYSCTL_DID1_QUAL_FQ 0x00000002 // Fully Qualified
9346 
9347 //*****************************************************************************
9348 //
9349 // The following are defines for the bit fields in the SYSCTL_DC0 register.
9350 //
9351 //*****************************************************************************
9352 #define SYSCTL_DC0_SRAMSZ_M 0xFFFF0000 // SRAM Size
9353 #define SYSCTL_DC0_SRAMSZ_2KB 0x00070000 // 2 KB of SRAM
9354 #define SYSCTL_DC0_SRAMSZ_4KB 0x000F0000 // 4 KB of SRAM
9355 #define SYSCTL_DC0_SRAMSZ_6KB 0x00170000 // 6 KB of SRAM
9356 #define SYSCTL_DC0_SRAMSZ_8KB 0x001F0000 // 8 KB of SRAM
9357 #define SYSCTL_DC0_SRAMSZ_12KB 0x002F0000 // 12 KB of SRAM
9358 #define SYSCTL_DC0_SRAMSZ_16KB 0x003F0000 // 16 KB of SRAM
9359 #define SYSCTL_DC0_SRAMSZ_20KB 0x004F0000 // 20 KB of SRAM
9360 #define SYSCTL_DC0_SRAMSZ_24KB 0x005F0000 // 24 KB of SRAM
9361 #define SYSCTL_DC0_SRAMSZ_32KB 0x007F0000 // 32 KB of SRAM
9362 #define SYSCTL_DC0_FLASHSZ_M 0x0000FFFF // Flash Size
9363 #define SYSCTL_DC0_FLASHSZ_8KB 0x00000003 // 8 KB of Flash
9364 #define SYSCTL_DC0_FLASHSZ_16KB 0x00000007 // 16 KB of Flash
9365 #define SYSCTL_DC0_FLASHSZ_32KB 0x0000000F // 32 KB of Flash
9366 #define SYSCTL_DC0_FLASHSZ_64KB 0x0000001F // 64 KB of Flash
9367 #define SYSCTL_DC0_FLASHSZ_96KB 0x0000002F // 96 KB of Flash
9368 #define SYSCTL_DC0_FLASHSZ_128K 0x0000003F // 128 KB of Flash
9369 #define SYSCTL_DC0_FLASHSZ_192K 0x0000005F // 192 KB of Flash
9370 #define SYSCTL_DC0_FLASHSZ_256K 0x0000007F // 256 KB of Flash
9371 
9372 //*****************************************************************************
9373 //
9374 // The following are defines for the bit fields in the SYSCTL_DC1 register.
9375 //
9376 //*****************************************************************************
9377 #define SYSCTL_DC1_WDT1 0x10000000 // Watchdog Timer1 Present
9378 #define SYSCTL_DC1_CAN1 0x02000000 // CAN Module 1 Present
9379 #define SYSCTL_DC1_CAN0 0x01000000 // CAN Module 0 Present
9380 #define SYSCTL_DC1_PWM1 0x00200000 // PWM Module 1 Present
9381 #define SYSCTL_DC1_PWM0 0x00100000 // PWM Module 0 Present
9382 #define SYSCTL_DC1_ADC1 0x00020000 // ADC Module 1 Present
9383 #define SYSCTL_DC1_ADC0 0x00010000 // ADC Module 0 Present
9384 #define SYSCTL_DC1_MINSYSDIV_M 0x0000F000 // System Clock Divider
9385 #define SYSCTL_DC1_MINSYSDIV_80 0x00002000 // Specifies an 80-MHz CPU clock
9386  // with a PLL divider of 2.5
9387 #define SYSCTL_DC1_MINSYSDIV_50 0x00003000 // Specifies a 50-MHz CPU clock
9388  // with a PLL divider of 4
9389 #define SYSCTL_DC1_MINSYSDIV_40 0x00004000 // Specifies a 40-MHz CPU clock
9390  // with a PLL divider of 5
9391 #define SYSCTL_DC1_MINSYSDIV_25 0x00007000 // Specifies a 25-MHz clock with a
9392  // PLL divider of 8
9393 #define SYSCTL_DC1_MINSYSDIV_20 0x00009000 // Specifies a 20-MHz clock with a
9394  // PLL divider of 10
9395 #define SYSCTL_DC1_ADC1SPD_M 0x00000C00 // Max ADC1 Speed
9396 #define SYSCTL_DC1_ADC1SPD_125K 0x00000000 // 125K samples/second
9397 #define SYSCTL_DC1_ADC1SPD_250K 0x00000400 // 250K samples/second
9398 #define SYSCTL_DC1_ADC1SPD_500K 0x00000800 // 500K samples/second
9399 #define SYSCTL_DC1_ADC1SPD_1M 0x00000C00 // 1M samples/second
9400 #define SYSCTL_DC1_ADC0SPD_M 0x00000300 // Max ADC0 Speed
9401 #define SYSCTL_DC1_ADC0SPD_125K 0x00000000 // 125K samples/second
9402 #define SYSCTL_DC1_ADC0SPD_250K 0x00000100 // 250K samples/second
9403 #define SYSCTL_DC1_ADC0SPD_500K 0x00000200 // 500K samples/second
9404 #define SYSCTL_DC1_ADC0SPD_1M 0x00000300 // 1M samples/second
9405 #define SYSCTL_DC1_MPU 0x00000080 // MPU Present
9406 #define SYSCTL_DC1_HIB 0x00000040 // Hibernation Module Present
9407 #define SYSCTL_DC1_TEMP 0x00000020 // Temp Sensor Present
9408 #define SYSCTL_DC1_PLL 0x00000010 // PLL Present
9409 #define SYSCTL_DC1_WDT0 0x00000008 // Watchdog Timer 0 Present
9410 #define SYSCTL_DC1_SWO 0x00000004 // SWO Trace Port Present
9411 #define SYSCTL_DC1_SWD 0x00000002 // SWD Present
9412 #define SYSCTL_DC1_JTAG 0x00000001 // JTAG Present
9413 
9414 //*****************************************************************************
9415 //
9416 // The following are defines for the bit fields in the SYSCTL_DC2 register.
9417 //
9418 //*****************************************************************************
9419 #define SYSCTL_DC2_EPI0 0x40000000 // EPI Module 0 Present
9420 #define SYSCTL_DC2_I2S0 0x10000000 // I2S Module 0 Present
9421 #define SYSCTL_DC2_COMP2 0x04000000 // Analog Comparator 2 Present
9422 #define SYSCTL_DC2_COMP1 0x02000000 // Analog Comparator 1 Present
9423 #define SYSCTL_DC2_COMP0 0x01000000 // Analog Comparator 0 Present
9424 #define SYSCTL_DC2_TIMER3 0x00080000 // Timer Module 3 Present
9425 #define SYSCTL_DC2_TIMER2 0x00040000 // Timer Module 2 Present
9426 #define SYSCTL_DC2_TIMER1 0x00020000 // Timer Module 1 Present
9427 #define SYSCTL_DC2_TIMER0 0x00010000 // Timer Module 0 Present
9428 #define SYSCTL_DC2_I2C1HS 0x00008000 // I2C Module 1 Speed
9429 #define SYSCTL_DC2_I2C1 0x00004000 // I2C Module 1 Present
9430 #define SYSCTL_DC2_I2C0HS 0x00002000 // I2C Module 0 Speed
9431 #define SYSCTL_DC2_I2C0 0x00001000 // I2C Module 0 Present
9432 #define SYSCTL_DC2_QEI1 0x00000200 // QEI Module 1 Present
9433 #define SYSCTL_DC2_QEI0 0x00000100 // QEI Module 0 Present
9434 #define SYSCTL_DC2_SSI1 0x00000020 // SSI Module 1 Present
9435 #define SYSCTL_DC2_SSI0 0x00000010 // SSI Module 0 Present
9436 #define SYSCTL_DC2_UART2 0x00000004 // UART Module 2 Present
9437 #define SYSCTL_DC2_UART1 0x00000002 // UART Module 1 Present
9438 #define SYSCTL_DC2_UART0 0x00000001 // UART Module 0 Present
9439 
9440 //*****************************************************************************

9443 //
9444 //*****************************************************************************
9445 #define SYSCTL_DC3_32KHZ 0x80000000 // 32KHz Input Clock Available
9446 #define SYSCTL_DC3_CCP5 0x20000000 // T2CCP1 Pin Present

9450 #define SYSCTL_DC3_CCP1 0x02000000 // T0CCP1 Pin Present
9451 #define SYSCTL_DC3_CCP0 0x01000000 // T0CCP0 Pin Present
9452 #define SYSCTL_DC3_ADC0AIN7 0x00800000 // ADC Module 0 AIN7 Pin Present
9453 #define SYSCTL_DC3_ADC0AIN6 0x00400000 // ADC Module 0 AIN6 Pin Present
9454 #define SYSCTL_DC3_ADC0AIN5 0x00200000 // ADC Module 0 AIN5 Pin Present
9455 #define SYSCTL_DC3_ADC0AIN4 0x00100000 // ADC Module 0 AIN4 Pin Present
9456 #define SYSCTL_DC3_ADC0AIN3 0x00080000 // ADC Module 0 AIN3 Pin Present
9457 #define SYSCTL_DC3_ADC0AIN2 0x00040000 // ADC Module 0 AIN2 Pin Present
9458 #define SYSCTL_DC3_ADC0AIN1 0x00020000 // ADC Module 0 AIN1 Pin Present
9459 #define SYSCTL_DC3_ADC0AIN0 0x00010000 // ADC Module 0 AIN0 Pin Present
9460 #define SYSCTL_DC3_PWMFAULT 0x00008000 // PWM Fault Pin Present
9461 #define SYSCTL_DC3_C2O 0x00004000 // C2o Pin Present
9462 #define SYSCTL_DC3_C2PLUS 0x00002000 // C2+ Pin Present
9463 #define SYSCTL_DC3_C2MINUS 0x00001000 // C2- Pin Present

9663 //*****************************************************************************
9664 //
9665 // The following are defines for the bit fields in the SYSCTL_RIS register.
9666 //
9667 //*****************************************************************************
9668 #define SYSCTL_RIS_BOR0RIS 0x00000800 // VDD under BOR0 Raw Interrupt
9669  // Status
9670 #define SYSCTL_RIS_VDDARIS 0x00000400 // VDDA Power OK Event Raw
9671  // Interrupt Status
9672 #define SYSCTL_RIS_MOSCPUPRIS 0x00000100 // MOSC Power Up Raw Interrupt
9673  // Status
9674 #define SYSCTL_RIS_USBPLLLRIS 0x00000080 // USB PLL Lock Raw Interrupt
9675  // Status
9676 #define SYSCTL_RIS_PLLLRIS 0x00000040 // PLL Lock Raw Interrupt Status
9677 #define SYSCTL_RIS_MOFRIS 0x00000008 // Main Oscillator Failure Raw
9678  // Interrupt Status
9679 #define SYSCTL_RIS_BOR1RIS 0x00000002 // VDD under BOR1 Raw Interrupt
9680  // Status
9681 
9682 //*****************************************************************************
9683 //
9684 // The following are defines for the bit fields in the SYSCTL_IMC register.
9685 //
9686 //*****************************************************************************
9687 #define SYSCTL_IMC_BOR0IM 0x00000800 // VDD under BOR0 Interrupt Mask
9688 #define SYSCTL_IMC_VDDAIM 0x00000400 // VDDA Power OK Interrupt Mask
9689 #define SYSCTL_IMC_MOSCPUPIM 0x00000100 // MOSC Power Up Interrupt Mask
9690 #define SYSCTL_IMC_USBPLLLIM 0x00000080 // USB PLL Lock Interrupt Mask
9691 #define SYSCTL_IMC_PLLLIM 0x00000040 // PLL Lock Interrupt Mask
9692 #define SYSCTL_IMC_MOFIM 0x00000008 // Main Oscillator Failure
9693  // Interrupt Mask
9694 #define SYSCTL_IMC_BOR1IM 0x00000002 // VDD under BOR1 Interrupt Mask
9695 
9696 //*****************************************************************************
9697 //

9699 //
9700 //*****************************************************************************

9702  // Status

9704  // Status
9705 #define SYSCTL_MISC_MOSCPUPMIS 0x00000100 // MOSC Power Up Masked Interrupt
9706  // Status
9707 #define SYSCTL_MISC_USBPLLLMIS 0x00000080 // USB PLL Lock Masked Interrupt
9708  // Status
9709 #define SYSCTL_MISC_PLLLMIS 0x00000040 // PLL Lock Masked Interrupt Status
9710 #define SYSCTL_MISC_MOFMIS 0x00000008 // Main Oscillator Failure Masked
9711  // Interrupt Status
9712 #define SYSCTL_MISC_BOR1MIS 0x00000002 // VDD under BOR1 Masked Interrupt
9713  // Status
9714 
9715 //*****************************************************************************
9716 //
9717 // The following are defines for the bit fields in the SYSCTL_RESC register.
9718 //
9719 //*****************************************************************************
9720 #define SYSCTL_RESC_MOSCFAIL 0x00010000 // MOSC Failure Reset
9721 #define SYSCTL_RESC_WDT1 0x00000020 // Watchdog Timer 1 Reset
9722 #define SYSCTL_RESC_SW 0x00000010 // Software Reset
9723 #define SYSCTL_RESC_WDT0 0x00000008 // Watchdog Timer 0 Reset
9724 #define SYSCTL_RESC_BOR 0x00000004 // Brown-Out Reset
9725 #define SYSCTL_RESC_POR 0x00000002 // Power-On Reset
9726 #define SYSCTL_RESC_EXT 0x00000001 // External Reset
9727 
9728 //*****************************************************************************
9729 //
9730 // The following are defines for the bit fields in the SYSCTL_RCC register.
9731 //
9732 //*****************************************************************************
9733 #define SYSCTL_RCC_ACG 0x08000000 // Auto Clock Gating
9734 #define SYSCTL_RCC_SYSDIV_M 0x07800000 // System Clock Divisor
9735 #define SYSCTL_RCC_USESYSDIV 0x00400000 // Enable System Clock Divider
9736 #define SYSCTL_RCC_USEPWMDIV 0x00100000 // Enable PWM Clock Divisor
9737 #define SYSCTL_RCC_PWMDIV_M 0x000E0000 // PWM Unit Clock Divisor
9738 #define SYSCTL_RCC_PWMDIV_2 0x00000000 // PWM clock /2
9739 #define SYSCTL_RCC_PWMDIV_4 0x00020000 // PWM clock /4
9740 #define SYSCTL_RCC_PWMDIV_8 0x00040000 // PWM clock /8
9741 #define SYSCTL_RCC_PWMDIV_16 0x00060000 // PWM clock /16
9742 #define SYSCTL_RCC_PWMDIV_32 0x00080000 // PWM clock /32
9743 #define SYSCTL_RCC_PWMDIV_64 0x000A0000 // PWM clock /64
9744 #define SYSCTL_RCC_PWRDN 0x00002000 // PLL Power Down
9745 #define SYSCTL_RCC_BYPASS 0x00000800 // PLL Bypass
9746 #define SYSCTL_RCC_XTAL_M 0x000007C0 // Crystal Value
9747 #define SYSCTL_RCC_XTAL_4MHZ 0x00000180 // 4 MHz
9748 #define SYSCTL_RCC_XTAL_4_09MHZ 0x000001C0 // 4.096 MHz
9749 #define SYSCTL_RCC_XTAL_4_91MHZ 0x00000200 // 4.9152 MHz
9750 #define SYSCTL_RCC_XTAL_5MHZ 0x00000240 // 5 MHz
9751 #define SYSCTL_RCC_XTAL_5_12MHZ 0x00000280 // 5.12 MHz
9752 #define SYSCTL_RCC_XTAL_6MHZ 0x000002C0 // 6 MHz
9753 #define SYSCTL_RCC_XTAL_6_14MHZ 0x00000300 // 6.144 MHz
9754 #define SYSCTL_RCC_XTAL_7_37MHZ 0x00000340 // 7.3728 MHz
9755 #define SYSCTL_RCC_XTAL_8MHZ 0x00000380 // 8 MHz
9756 #define SYSCTL_RCC_XTAL_8_19MHZ 0x000003C0 // 8.192 MHz
9757 #define SYSCTL_RCC_XTAL_10MHZ 0x00000400 // 10 MHz
9758 #define SYSCTL_RCC_XTAL_12MHZ 0x00000440 // 12 MHz
9759 #define SYSCTL_RCC_XTAL_12_2MHZ 0x00000480 // 12.288 MHz
9760 #define SYSCTL_RCC_XTAL_13_5MHZ 0x000004C0 // 13.56 MHz
9761 #define SYSCTL_RCC_XTAL_14_3MHZ 0x00000500 // 14.31818 MHz
9762 #define SYSCTL_RCC_XTAL_16MHZ 0x00000540 // 16 MHz
9763 #define SYSCTL_RCC_XTAL_16_3MHZ 0x00000580 // 16.384 MHz
9764 #define SYSCTL_RCC_XTAL_18MHZ 0x000005C0 // 18.0 MHz (USB)
9765 #define SYSCTL_RCC_XTAL_20MHZ 0x00000600 // 20.0 MHz (USB)
9766 #define SYSCTL_RCC_XTAL_24MHZ 0x00000640 // 24.0 MHz (USB)
9767 #define SYSCTL_RCC_XTAL_25MHZ 0x00000680 // 25.0 MHz (USB)
9768 #define SYSCTL_RCC_OSCSRC_M 0x00000030 // Oscillator Source
9769 #define SYSCTL_RCC_OSCSRC_MAIN 0x00000000 // MOSC
9770 #define SYSCTL_RCC_OSCSRC_INT 0x00000010 // IOSC
9771 #define SYSCTL_RCC_OSCSRC_INT4 0x00000020 // IOSC/4
9772 #define SYSCTL_RCC_OSCSRC_30 0x00000030 // LFIOSC
9773 #define SYSCTL_RCC_MOSCDIS 0x00000001 // Main Oscillator Disable
9774 #define SYSCTL_RCC_SYSDIV_S 23
9775 
9776 //*****************************************************************************
9777 //
9778 // The following are defines for the bit fields in the SYSCTL_GPIOHBCTL
9779 // register.
9780 //
9781 //*****************************************************************************
9782 #define SYSCTL_GPIOHBCTL_PORTF 0x00000020 // Port F Advanced High-Performance
9783  // Bus
9784 #define SYSCTL_GPIOHBCTL_PORTE 0x00000010 // Port E Advanced High-Performance
9785  // Bus
9786 #define SYSCTL_GPIOHBCTL_PORTD 0x00000008 // Port D Advanced High-Performance
9787  // Bus
9788 #define SYSCTL_GPIOHBCTL_PORTC 0x00000004 // Port C Advanced High-Performance
9789  // Bus
9790 #define SYSCTL_GPIOHBCTL_PORTB 0x00000002 // Port B Advanced High-Performance
9791  // Bus
9792 #define SYSCTL_GPIOHBCTL_PORTA 0x00000001 // Port A Advanced High-Performance
9793  // Bus
9794 
9795 //*****************************************************************************
9796 //
9797 // The following are defines for the bit fields in the SYSCTL_RCC2 register.
9798 //
9799 //*****************************************************************************
9800 #define SYSCTL_RCC2_USERCC2 0x80000000 // Use RCC2
9801 #define SYSCTL_RCC2_DIV400 0x40000000 // Divide PLL as 400 MHz vs. 200
9802  // MHz
9803 #define SYSCTL_RCC2_SYSDIV2_M 0x1F800000 // System Clock Divisor 2
9804 #define SYSCTL_RCC2_SYSDIV2LSB 0x00400000 // Additional LSB for SYSDIV2
9805 #define SYSCTL_RCC2_USBPWRDN 0x00004000 // Power-Down USB PLL
9806 #define SYSCTL_RCC2_PWRDN2 0x00002000 // Power-Down PLL 2
9807 #define SYSCTL_RCC2_BYPASS2 0x00000800 // PLL Bypass 2
9808 #define SYSCTL_RCC2_OSCSRC2_M 0x00000070 // Oscillator Source 2
9809 #define SYSCTL_RCC2_OSCSRC2_MO 0x00000000 // MOSC
9810 #define SYSCTL_RCC2_OSCSRC2_IO 0x00000010 // PIOSC
9811 #define SYSCTL_RCC2_OSCSRC2_IO4 0x00000020 // PIOSC/4
9812 #define SYSCTL_RCC2_OSCSRC2_30 0x00000030 // LFIOSC
9813 #define SYSCTL_RCC2_OSCSRC2_32 0x00000070 // 32.768 kHz
9814 #define SYSCTL_RCC2_SYSDIV2_S 23
9815

9817 //
