9819 //
9820 //*****************************************************************************
9821 #define SYSCTL_MOSCCTL_NOXTAL 0x00000004 // No Crystal Connected
9822 #define SYSCTL_MOSCCTL_MOSCIM 0x00000002 // MOSC Failure Action
9823 #define SYSCTL_MOSCCTL_CVAL 0x00000001 // Clock Validation for MOSC
9824 
9825 //*****************************************************************************
9826 //
9827 // The following are defines for the bit fields in the SYSCTL_RCGC0 register.
9828 //
9829 //*****************************************************************************
9830 #define SYSCTL_RCGC0_WDT1 0x10000000 // WDT1 Clock Gating Control
9831 #define SYSCTL_RCGC0_CAN1 0x02000000 // CAN1 Clock Gating Control
9832 #define SYSCTL_RCGC0_CAN0 0x01000000 // CAN0 Clock Gating Control
9833 #define SYSCTL_RCGC0_PWM0 0x00100000 // PWM Clock Gating Control
9834 #define SYSCTL_RCGC0_ADC1 0x00020000 // ADC1 Clock Gating Control
9835 #define SYSCTL_RCGC0_ADC0 0x00010000 // ADC0 Clock Gating Control
9836 #define SYSCTL_RCGC0_ADC1SPD_M 0x00000C00 // ADC1 Sample Speed
9837 #define SYSCTL_RCGC0_ADC1SPD_125K \
9838  0x00000000 // 125K samples/second
9839 #define SYSCTL_RCGC0_ADC1SPD_250K \
9840  0x00000400 // 250K samples/second
9841 #define SYSCTL_RCGC0_ADC1SPD_500K \
9842  0x00000800 // 500K samples/second
9843 #define SYSCTL_RCGC0_ADC1SPD_1M 0x00000C00 // 1M samples/second
9844 #define SYSCTL_RCGC0_ADC0SPD_M 0x00000300 // ADC0 Sample Speed
9845 #define SYSCTL_RCGC0_ADC0SPD_125K \
9846  0x00000000 // 125K samples/second
9847 #define SYSCTL_RCGC0_ADC0SPD_250K \
9848  0x00000100 // 250K samples/second
9849 #define SYSCTL_RCGC0_ADC0SPD_500K \
9850  0x00000200 // 500K samples/second
9851 #define SYSCTL_RCGC0_ADC0SPD_1M 0x00000300 // 1M samples/second
9852 #define SYSCTL_RCGC0_HIB 0x00000040 // HIB Clock Gating Control
9853 #define SYSCTL_RCGC0_WDT0 0x00000008 // WDT0 Clock Gating Control
9854

9864 #define SYSCTL_RCGC1_TIMER1 0x00020000 // Timer 1 Clock Gating Control

9874 #define SYSCTL_RCGC1_UART0 0x00000001 // UART0 Clock Gating Control

10023 //*****************************************************************************

10025 // The following are defines for the bit fields in the SYSCTL_PIOSCSTAT
10026 // register.
10027 //
10028 //*****************************************************************************
10029 #define SYSCTL_PIOSCSTAT_DT_M 0x007F0000 // Default Trim Value
10030 #define SYSCTL_PIOSCSTAT_CR_M 0x00000300 // Calibration Result
10031 #define SYSCTL_PIOSCSTAT_CRNONE 0x00000000 // Calibration has not been
10032  // attempted
10033 #define SYSCTL_PIOSCSTAT_CRPASS 0x00000100 // The last calibration operation
10034  // completed to meet 1% accuracy
10035 #define SYSCTL_PIOSCSTAT_CRFAIL 0x00000200 // The last calibration operation
10036  // failed to meet 1% accuracy
10037 #define SYSCTL_PIOSCSTAT_CT_M 0x0000007F // Calibration Trim Value
10038 #define SYSCTL_PIOSCSTAT_DT_S 16
10039 #define SYSCTL_PIOSCSTAT_CT_S 0
10040

10149 #define SYSCTL_LDOSPCTL_VLDO_M 0x000000FF // LDO Output Voltage
10150 #define SYSCTL_LDOSPCTL_VLDO_0_90V \
10151  0x00000012 // 0.90 V
10152 #define SYSCTL_LDOSPCTL_VLDO_0_95V \
10153  0x00000013 // 0.95 V

10155  0x00000014 // 1.00 V
10156 #define SYSCTL_LDOSPCTL_VLDO_1_05V \
10157  0x00000015 // 1.05 V
10158 #define SYSCTL_LDOSPCTL_VLDO_1_10V \
10159  0x00000016 // 1.10 V
10160 #define SYSCTL_LDOSPCTL_VLDO_1_15V \
10161  0x00000017 // 1.15 V
10162 #define SYSCTL_LDOSPCTL_VLDO_1_20V \
10163  0x00000018 // 1.20 V
10164 
10165 //*****************************************************************************
10166 //
10167 // The following are defines for the bit fields in the SYSCTL_LDODPCTL
10168 // register.
10169 //
10170 //*****************************************************************************
10171 #define SYSCTL_LDODPCTL_VADJEN 0x80000000 // Voltage Adjust Enable
10172 #define SYSCTL_LDODPCTL_VLDO_M 0x000000FF // LDO Output Voltage
10173 #define SYSCTL_LDODPCTL_VLDO_0_90V \
10174  0x00000012 // 0.90 V
10175 #define SYSCTL_LDODPCTL_VLDO_0_95V \
10176  0x00000013 // 0.95 V
10177 #define SYSCTL_LDODPCTL_VLDO_1_00V \
10178  0x00000014 // 1.00 V
10179 #define SYSCTL_LDODPCTL_VLDO_1_05V \
10180  0x00000015 // 1.05 V
10181 #define SYSCTL_LDODPCTL_VLDO_1_10V \
10182  0x00000016 // 1.10 V
10183 #define SYSCTL_LDODPCTL_VLDO_1_15V \
10184  0x00000017 // 1.15 V
10185 #define SYSCTL_LDODPCTL_VLDO_1_20V \
10186  0x00000018 // 1.20 V
10187 
10188 //*****************************************************************************
10189 //
10190 // The following are defines for the bit fields in the SYSCTL_PPWD register.
10191 //
10192 //*****************************************************************************
10193 #define SYSCTL_PPWD_P1 0x00000002 // Watchdog Timer 1 Present
10194 #define SYSCTL_PPWD_P0 0x00000001 // Watchdog Timer 0 Present
10195 
10196 //*****************************************************************************
10197 //
10198 // The following are defines for the bit fields in the SYSCTL_PPTIMER register.
10199 //
10200 //*****************************************************************************
10201 #define SYSCTL_PPTIMER_P5 0x00000020 // 16/32-Bit General-Purpose Timer
10202  // 5 Present
10203 #define SYSCTL_PPTIMER_P4 0x00000010 // 16/32-Bit General-Purpose Timer
10204  // 4 Present
10205 #define SYSCTL_PPTIMER_P3 0x00000008 // 16/32-Bit General-Purpose Timer
10206  // 3 Present
10207 #define SYSCTL_PPTIMER_P2 0x00000004 // 16/32-Bit General-Purpose Timer
10208  // 2 Present
10209 #define SYSCTL_PPTIMER_P1 0x00000002 // 16/32-Bit General-Purpose Timer
10210  // 1 Present
10211 #define SYSCTL_PPTIMER_P0 0x00000001 // 16/32-Bit General-Purpose Timer
10212  // 0 Present
10213

10217 //

10220 #define SYSCTL_PPGPIO_P13 0x00002000 // GPIO Port P Present
10221 #define SYSCTL_PPGPIO_P12 0x00001000 // GPIO Port N Present
10222 #define SYSCTL_PPGPIO_P11 0x00000800 // GPIO Port M Present
10223 #define SYSCTL_PPGPIO_P10 0x00000400 // GPIO Port L Present
10224 #define SYSCTL_PPGPIO_P9 0x00000200 // GPIO Port K Present
10225 #define SYSCTL_PPGPIO_P8 0x00000100 // GPIO Port J Present
10226 #define SYSCTL_PPGPIO_P7 0x00000080 // GPIO Port H Present
10227 #define SYSCTL_PPGPIO_P6 0x00000040 // GPIO Port G Present
10228 #define SYSCTL_PPGPIO_P5 0x00000020 // GPIO Port F Present
10229 #define SYSCTL_PPGPIO_P4 0x00000010 // GPIO Port E Present

10698  // Gating Control

10700 //*****************************************************************************
10701 //
10702 // The following are defines for the bit fields in the SYSCTL_RCGCWTIMER
10703 // register.
10704 //
10705 //*****************************************************************************
10706 #define SYSCTL_RCGCWTIMER_R5 0x00000020 // 32/64-Bit Wide General-Purpose
10707  // Timer 5 Run Mode Clock Gating
10708  // Control
10709 #define SYSCTL_RCGCWTIMER_R4 0x00000010 // 32/64-Bit Wide General-Purpose
10710  // Timer 4 Run Mode Clock Gating
10711  // Control
10712 #define SYSCTL_RCGCWTIMER_R3 0x00000008 // 32/64-Bit Wide General-Purpose
10713  // Timer 3 Run Mode Clock Gating
10714  // Control
10715 #define SYSCTL_RCGCWTIMER_R2 0x00000004 // 32/64-Bit Wide General-Purpose
10716  // Timer 2 Run Mode Clock Gating
10717  // Control
10718 #define SYSCTL_RCGCWTIMER_R1 0x00000002 // 32/64-Bit Wide General-Purpose
10719  // Timer 1 Run Mode Clock Gating
10720  // Control
10721 #define SYSCTL_RCGCWTIMER_R0 0x00000001 // 32/64-Bit Wide General-Purpose
10722  // Timer 0 Run Mode Clock Gating
10723  // Control
10724 
10725 //*****************************************************************************
10726 //
10727 // The following are defines for the bit fields in the SYSCTL_SCGCWD register.
10728 //
10729 //*****************************************************************************
10730 #define SYSCTL_SCGCWD_S1 0x00000002 // Watchdog Timer 1 Sleep Mode
10731  // Clock Gating Control
10732 #define SYSCTL_SCGCWD_S0 0x00000001 // Watchdog Timer 0 Sleep Mode
10733  // Clock Gating Control
10734

10743  // Control

10749  // Control

10751  // 2 Sleep Mode Clock Gating
10752  // Control

10755  // Control

11254 //*****************************************************************************
11255 //
11256 // The following are defines for the bit fields in the SYSCTL_PRADC register.
11257 //
11258 //*****************************************************************************
11259 #define SYSCTL_PRADC_R1 0x00000002 // ADC Module 1 Peripheral Ready
11260 #define SYSCTL_PRADC_R0 0x00000001 // ADC Module 0 Peripheral Ready
11261 
11262 //*****************************************************************************
11263 //
11264 // The following are defines for the bit fields in the SYSCTL_PRACMP register.
11265 //
11266 //*****************************************************************************
11267 #define SYSCTL_PRACMP_R0 0x00000001 // Analog Comparator Module 0
11268  // Peripheral Ready
11269 
11270 //*****************************************************************************
11271 //
11272 // The following are defines for the bit fields in the SYSCTL_PRPWM register.
11273 //
11274 //*****************************************************************************
11275 #define SYSCTL_PRPWM_R1 0x00000002 // PWM Module 1 Peripheral Ready
11276 #define SYSCTL_PRPWM_R0 0x00000001 // PWM Module 0 Peripheral Ready
11277

11289 // register.

11293 
11294 //*****************************************************************************
11295 //
11296 // The following are defines for the bit fields in the SYSCTL_PRWTIMER
11297 // register.
11298 //
11299 //*****************************************************************************
11300 #define SYSCTL_PRWTIMER_R5 0x00000020 // 32/64-Bit Wide General-Purpose
11301  // Timer 5 Peripheral Ready
11302 #define SYSCTL_PRWTIMER_R4 0x00000010 // 32/64-Bit Wide General-Purpose
11303  // Timer 4 Peripheral Ready
11304 #define SYSCTL_PRWTIMER_R3 0x00000008 // 32/64-Bit Wide General-Purpose
11305  // Timer 3 Peripheral Ready
11306 #define SYSCTL_PRWTIMER_R2 0x00000004 // 32/64-Bit Wide General-Purpose
11307  // Timer 2 Peripheral Ready
11308 #define SYSCTL_PRWTIMER_R1 0x00000002 // 32/64-Bit Wide General-Purpose
11309  // Timer 1 Peripheral Ready
11310 #define SYSCTL_PRWTIMER_R0 0x00000001 // 32/64-Bit Wide General-Purpose
11311  // Timer 0 Peripheral Ready
11312 
11313 //*****************************************************************************
11314 //
11315 // The following are defines for the bit fields in the UDMA_STAT register.
11316 //
11317 //*****************************************************************************
11318 #define UDMA_STAT_DMACHANS_M 0x001F0000 // Available uDMA Channels Minus 1
11319 #define UDMA_STAT_STATE_M 0x000000F0 // Control State Machine Status
11320 #define UDMA_STAT_STATE_IDLE 0x00000000 // Idle
11321 #define UDMA_STAT_STATE_RD_CTRL 0x00000010 // Reading channel controller data
11322 #define UDMA_STAT_STATE_RD_SRCENDP \
11323  0x00000020 // Reading source end pointer
11324 #define UDMA_STAT_STATE_RD_DSTENDP \
11325  0x00000030 // Reading destination end pointer
11326 #define UDMA_STAT_STATE_RD_SRCDAT \
11327  0x00000040 // Reading source data
11328 #define UDMA_STAT_STATE_WR_DSTDAT \
11329  0x00000050 // Writing destination data
11330 #define UDMA_STAT_STATE_WAIT 0x00000060 // Waiting for uDMA request to
11331  // clear
11332 #define UDMA_STAT_STATE_WR_CTRL 0x00000070 // Writing channel controller data
11333 #define UDMA_STAT_STATE_STALL 0x00000080 // Stalled
11334 #define UDMA_STAT_STATE_DONE 0x00000090 // Done
11335 #define UDMA_STAT_STATE_UNDEF 0x000000A0 // Undefined
11336 #define UDMA_STAT_MASTEN 0x00000001 // Master Enable Status
11337 #define UDMA_STAT_DMACHANS_S 16
11338

11340 //

11342 //
11343 //*****************************************************************************
11344 #define UDMA_CFG_MASTEN 0x00000001 // Controller Master Enable
11345

11476 //*****************************************************************************
11477 //
11478 // The following are defines for the bit fields in the UDMA_CHMAP0 register.
11479 //
11480 //*****************************************************************************
11481 #define UDMA_CHMAP0_CH7SEL_M 0xF0000000 // uDMA Channel 7 Source Select
11482 #define UDMA_CHMAP0_CH6SEL_M 0x0F000000 // uDMA Channel 6 Source Select
11483 #define UDMA_CHMAP0_CH5SEL_M 0x00F00000 // uDMA Channel 5 Source Select
11484 #define UDMA_CHMAP0_CH4SEL_M 0x000F0000 // uDMA Channel 4 Source Select
11485 #define UDMA_CHMAP0_CH3SEL_M 0x0000F000 // uDMA Channel 3 Source Select
11486 #define UDMA_CHMAP0_CH2SEL_M 0x00000F00 // uDMA Channel 2 Source Select
11487 #define UDMA_CHMAP0_CH1SEL_M 0x000000F0 // uDMA Channel 1 Source Select
11488 #define UDMA_CHMAP0_CH0SEL_M 0x0000000F // uDMA Channel 0 Source Select
11489 #define UDMA_CHMAP0_CH7SEL_S 28
11490 #define UDMA_CHMAP0_CH6SEL_S 24
11491 #define UDMA_CHMAP0_CH5SEL_S 20
11492 #define UDMA_CHMAP0_CH4SEL_S 16
11493 #define UDMA_CHMAP0_CH3SEL_S 12
11494 #define UDMA_CHMAP0_CH2SEL_S 8
11495 #define UDMA_CHMAP0_CH1SEL_S 4
11496 #define UDMA_CHMAP0_CH0SEL_S 0
11497

11580 //*****************************************************************************
11581 //
11582 // The following are defines for the bit fields in the UDMA_O_CHCTL register.
11583 //
11584 //*****************************************************************************
11585 #define UDMA_CHCTL_DSTINC_M 0xC0000000 // Destination Address Increment
11586 #define UDMA_CHCTL_DSTINC_8 0x00000000 // Byte
11587 #define UDMA_CHCTL_DSTINC_16 0x40000000 // Half-word
11588 #define UDMA_CHCTL_DSTINC_32 0x80000000 // Word
11589 #define UDMA_CHCTL_DSTINC_NONE 0xC0000000 // No increment
11590 #define UDMA_CHCTL_DSTSIZE_M 0x30000000 // Destination Data Size
11591 #define UDMA_CHCTL_DSTSIZE_8 0x00000000 // Byte
11592 #define UDMA_CHCTL_DSTSIZE_16 0x10000000 // Half-word
11593 #define UDMA_CHCTL_DSTSIZE_32 0x20000000 // Word
11594 #define UDMA_CHCTL_SRCINC_M 0x0C000000 // Source Address Increment
11595 #define UDMA_CHCTL_SRCINC_8 0x00000000 // Byte
11596 #define UDMA_CHCTL_SRCINC_16 0x04000000 // Half-word
11597 #define UDMA_CHCTL_SRCINC_32 0x08000000 // Word
11598 #define UDMA_CHCTL_SRCINC_NONE 0x0C000000 // No increment
11599 #define UDMA_CHCTL_SRCSIZE_M 0x03000000 // Source Data Size
11600 #define UDMA_CHCTL_SRCSIZE_8 0x00000000 // Byte
11601 #define UDMA_CHCTL_SRCSIZE_16 0x01000000 // Half-word
11602 #define UDMA_CHCTL_SRCSIZE_32 0x02000000 // Word
11603 #define UDMA_CHCTL_ARBSIZE_M 0x0003C000 // Arbitration Size
11604 #define UDMA_CHCTL_ARBSIZE_1 0x00000000 // 1 Transfer
11605 #define UDMA_CHCTL_ARBSIZE_2 0x00004000 // 2 Transfers
11606 #define UDMA_CHCTL_ARBSIZE_4 0x00008000 // 4 Transfers
11607 #define UDMA_CHCTL_ARBSIZE_8 0x0000C000 // 8 Transfers
11608 #define UDMA_CHCTL_ARBSIZE_16 0x00010000 // 16 Transfers
11609 #define UDMA_CHCTL_ARBSIZE_32 0x00014000 // 32 Transfers
11610 #define UDMA_CHCTL_ARBSIZE_64 0x00018000 // 64 Transfers
11611 #define UDMA_CHCTL_ARBSIZE_128 0x0001C000 // 128 Transfers
11612 #define UDMA_CHCTL_ARBSIZE_256 0x00020000 // 256 Transfers
11613 #define UDMA_CHCTL_ARBSIZE_512 0x00024000 // 512 Transfers
11614 #define UDMA_CHCTL_ARBSIZE_1024 0x00028000 // 1024 Transfers
11615 #define UDMA_CHCTL_XFERSIZE_M 0x00003FF0 // Transfer Size (minus 1)
11616 #define UDMA_CHCTL_NXTUSEBURST 0x00000008 // Next Useburst
11617 #define UDMA_CHCTL_XFERMODE_M 0x00000007 // uDMA Transfer Mode
11618 #define UDMA_CHCTL_XFERMODE_STOP \
11619  0x00000000 // Stop
11620 #define UDMA_CHCTL_XFERMODE_BASIC \
11621  0x00000001 // Basic
11622 #define UDMA_CHCTL_XFERMODE_AUTO \
11623  0x00000002 // Auto-Request
11624 #define UDMA_CHCTL_XFERMODE_PINGPONG \
11625  0x00000003 // Ping-Pong
11626 #define UDMA_CHCTL_XFERMODE_MEM_SG \
11627  0x00000004 // Memory Scatter-Gather
11628 #define UDMA_CHCTL_XFERMODE_MEM_SGA \
11629  0x00000005 // Alternate Memory Scatter-Gather
11630 #define UDMA_CHCTL_XFERMODE_PER_SG \
11631  0x00000006 // Peripheral Scatter-Gather
11632 #define UDMA_CHCTL_XFERMODE_PER_SGA \
11633  0x00000007 // Alternate Peripheral
11634  // Scatter-Gather
11635 #define UDMA_CHCTL_XFERSIZE_S 4
11636 
11637 //*****************************************************************************
11638 //
11639 // The following are defines for the bit fields in the NVIC_ACTLR register.
11640 //
11641 //*****************************************************************************
11642 #define NVIC_ACTLR_DISOOFP 0x00000200 // Disable Out-Of-Order Floating
11643  // Point
11644 #define NVIC_ACTLR_DISFPCA 0x00000100 // Disable CONTROL
11645 #define NVIC_ACTLR_DISFOLD 0x00000004 // Disable IT Folding
11646 #define NVIC_ACTLR_DISWBUF 0x00000002 // Disable Write Buffer
11647 #define NVIC_ACTLR_DISMCYC 0x00000001 // Disable Interrupts of Multiple
11648  // Cycle Instructions
11649

11802 
11803 //*****************************************************************************
11804 //
11805 // The following are defines for the bit fields in the NVIC_UNPEND3 register.
11806 //
11807 //*****************************************************************************
11808 #define NVIC_UNPEND3_INT_M 0xFFFFFFFF // Interrupt Clear Pending
11809 
11810 //*****************************************************************************
11811 //
11812 // The following are defines for the bit fields in the NVIC_UNPEND4 register.
11813 //
11814 //*****************************************************************************
11815 #define NVIC_UNPEND4_INT_M 0x000007FF // Interrupt Clear Pending
11816 
11817 //*****************************************************************************
11818 //
11819 // The following are defines for the bit fields in the NVIC_ACTIVE0 register.
11820 //
11821 //*****************************************************************************
11822 #define NVIC_ACTIVE0_INT_M 0xFFFFFFFF // Interrupt Active
11823

11852 //*****************************************************************************
11853 //
11854 // The following are defines for the bit fields in the NVIC_PRI0 register.
11855 //
11856 //*****************************************************************************
11857 #define NVIC_PRI0_INT3_M 0xE0000000 // Interrupt 3 Priority Mask
11858 #define NVIC_PRI0_INT2_M 0x00E00000 // Interrupt 2 Priority Mask
11859 #define NVIC_PRI0_INT1_M 0x0000E000 // Interrupt 1 Priority Mask
11860 #define NVIC_PRI0_INT0_M 0x000000E0 // Interrupt 0 Priority Mask
11861 #define NVIC_PRI0_INT3_S 29
11862 #define NVIC_PRI0_INT2_S 21
11863 #define NVIC_PRI0_INT1_S 13
11864 #define NVIC_PRI0_INT0_S 5
11865

12291 #define NVIC_PRI31_INTD_M 0xE0000000 // Interrupt 127 Priority Mask

12293 #define NVIC_PRI31_INTB_M 0x0000E000 // Interrupt 125 Priority Mask
12294 #define NVIC_PRI31_INTA_M 0x000000E0 // Interrupt 124 Priority Mask
12295 #define NVIC_PRI31_INTD_S 29
12296 #define NVIC_PRI31_INTC_S 21
12297 #define NVIC_PRI31_INTB_S 13
12298 #define NVIC_PRI31_INTA_S 5
12299 
12300 //*****************************************************************************
12301 //
12302 // The following are defines for the bit fields in the NVIC_PRI32 register.
12303 //
12304 //*****************************************************************************
12305 #define NVIC_PRI32_INTD_M 0xE0000000 // Interrupt 131 Priority Mask
12306 #define NVIC_PRI32_INTC_M 0x00E00000 // Interrupt 130 Priority Mask
12307 #define NVIC_PRI32_INTB_M 0x0000E000 // Interrupt 129 Priority Mask
12308 #define NVIC_PRI32_INTA_M 0x000000E0 // Interrupt 128 Priority Mask
12309 #define NVIC_PRI32_INTD_S 29
12310 #define NVIC_PRI32_INTC_S 21
12311 #define NVIC_PRI32_INTB_S 13
12312 #define NVIC_PRI32_INTA_S 5
12313 
12314 //*****************************************************************************
12315 //
12316 // The following are defines for the bit fields in the NVIC_PRI33 register.
12317 //
12318 //*****************************************************************************
12319 #define NVIC_PRI33_INTD_M 0xE0000000 // Interrupt Priority for Interrupt
12320  // [4n+3]
12321 #define NVIC_PRI33_INTC_M 0x00E00000 // Interrupt Priority for Interrupt
12322  // [4n+2]
12323 #define NVIC_PRI33_INTB_M 0x0000E000 // Interrupt Priority for Interrupt
12324  // [4n+1]
12325 #define NVIC_PRI33_INTA_M 0x000000E0 // Interrupt Priority for Interrupt
12326  // [4n]
12327 #define NVIC_PRI33_INTD_S 29
12328 #define NVIC_PRI33_INTC_S 21
12329 #define NVIC_PRI33_INTB_S 13
12330 #define NVIC_PRI33_INTA_S 5
12331 
12332 //*****************************************************************************
12333 //
12334 // The following are defines for the bit fields in the NVIC_PRI34 register.
12335 //
12336 //*****************************************************************************
12337 #define NVIC_PRI34_INTD_M 0xE0000000 // Interrupt Priority for Interrupt
12338  // [4n+3]
12339 #define NVIC_PRI34_INTC_M 0x00E00000 // Interrupt Priority for Interrupt
12340  // [4n+2]
12341 #define NVIC_PRI34_INTB_M 0x0000E000 // Interrupt Priority for Interrupt
12342  // [4n+1]
12343 #define NVIC_PRI34_INTA_M 0x000000E0 // Interrupt Priority for Interrupt
12344  // [4n]
12345 #define NVIC_PRI34_INTD_S 29
12346 #define NVIC_PRI34_INTC_S 21
12347 #define NVIC_PRI34_INTB_S 13
12348 #define NVIC_PRI34_INTA_S 5
12349 
12350 //*****************************************************************************
12351 //
12352 // The following are defines for the bit fields in the NVIC_CPUID register.
12353 //
12354 //*****************************************************************************
12355 #define NVIC_CPUID_IMP_M 0xFF000000 // Implementer Code
12356 #define NVIC_CPUID_IMP_ARM 0x41000000 // ARM
12357 #define NVIC_CPUID_VAR_M 0x00F00000 // Variant Number
12358 #define NVIC_CPUID_CON_M 0x000F0000 // Constant
12359 #define NVIC_CPUID_PARTNO_M 0x0000FFF0 // Part Number
12360 #define NVIC_CPUID_PARTNO_CM4 0x0000C240 // Cortex-M4 processor
12361 #define NVIC_CPUID_REV_M 0x0000000F // Revision Number
12362 
12363 //*****************************************************************************
12364 //
12365 // The following are defines for the bit fields in the NVIC_INT_CTRL register.
12366 //
12367 //*****************************************************************************
12368 #define NVIC_INT_CTRL_NMI_SET 0x80000000 // NMI Set Pending
12369 #define NVIC_INT_CTRL_PEND_SV 0x10000000 // PendSV Set Pending
12370 #define NVIC_INT_CTRL_UNPEND_SV 0x08000000 // PendSV Clear Pending
12371 #define NVIC_INT_CTRL_PENDSTSET 0x04000000 // SysTick Set Pending
12372 #define NVIC_INT_CTRL_PENDSTCLR 0x02000000 // SysTick Clear Pending
12373 #define NVIC_INT_CTRL_ISR_PRE 0x00800000 // Debug Interrupt Handling
12374 #define NVIC_INT_CTRL_ISR_PEND 0x00400000 // Interrupt Pending
12375 #define NVIC_INT_CTRL_VEC_PEN_M 0x000FF000 // Interrupt Pending Vector Number
12376 #define NVIC_INT_CTRL_VEC_PEN_NMI \
12377  0x00002000 // NMI
12378 #define NVIC_INT_CTRL_VEC_PEN_HARD \
12379  0x00003000 // Hard fault
12380 #define NVIC_INT_CTRL_VEC_PEN_MEM \
12381  0x00004000 // Memory management fault
12382 #define NVIC_INT_CTRL_VEC_PEN_BUS \
12383  0x00005000 // Bus fault
12384 #define NVIC_INT_CTRL_VEC_PEN_USG \
12385  0x00006000 // Usage fault
12386 #define NVIC_INT_CTRL_VEC_PEN_SVC \
12387  0x0000B000 // SVCall
12388 #define NVIC_INT_CTRL_VEC_PEN_PNDSV \
12389  0x0000E000 // PendSV
12390 #define NVIC_INT_CTRL_VEC_PEN_TICK \
12391  0x0000F000 // SysTick
12392 #define NVIC_INT_CTRL_RET_BASE 0x00000800 // Return to Base
12393 #define NVIC_INT_CTRL_VEC_ACT_M 0x000000FF // Interrupt Pending Vector Number
12394 #define NVIC_INT_CTRL_VEC_ACT_S 0
12395 
12396 //*****************************************************************************
12397 //
12398 // The following are defines for the bit fields in the NVIC_VTABLE register.
12399 //
12400 //*****************************************************************************
12401 #define NVIC_VTABLE_OFFSET_M 0xFFFFFC00 // Vector Table Offset
12402 #define NVIC_VTABLE_OFFSET_S 10
12403 
12404 //*****************************************************************************
12405 //
12406 // The following are defines for the bit fields in the NVIC_APINT register.
12407 //
12408 //*****************************************************************************
12409 #define NVIC_APINT_VECTKEY_M 0xFFFF0000 // Register Key
12410 #define NVIC_APINT_VECTKEY 0x05FA0000 // Vector key
12411 #define NVIC_APINT_ENDIANESS 0x00008000 // Data Endianess
12412 #define NVIC_APINT_PRIGROUP_M 0x00000700 // Interrupt Priority Grouping
12413 #define NVIC_APINT_PRIGROUP_7_1 0x00000000 // Priority group 7.1 split
12414 #define NVIC_APINT_PRIGROUP_6_2 0x00000100 // Priority group 6.2 split
12415 #define NVIC_APINT_PRIGROUP_5_3 0x00000200 // Priority group 5.3 split
12416 #define NVIC_APINT_PRIGROUP_4_4 0x00000300 // Priority group 4.4 split
12417 #define NVIC_APINT_PRIGROUP_3_5 0x00000400 // Priority group 3.5 split
12418 #define NVIC_APINT_PRIGROUP_2_6 0x00000500 // Priority group 2.6 split
12419 #define NVIC_APINT_PRIGROUP_1_7 0x00000600 // Priority group 1.7 split
12420 #define NVIC_APINT_PRIGROUP_0_8 0x00000700 // Priority group 0.8 split
12421 #define NVIC_APINT_SYSRESETREQ 0x00000004 // System Reset Request
12422 #define NVIC_APINT_VECT_CLR_ACT 0x00000002 // Clear Active NMI / Fault
12423 #define NVIC_APINT_VECT_RESET 0x00000001 // System Reset
12424

12426 //
12427 // The following are defines for the bit fields in the NVIC_SYS_CTRL register.
12428 //
12429 //*****************************************************************************
12430 #define NVIC_SYS_CTRL_SEVONPEND 0x00000010 // Wake Up on Pending
12431 #define NVIC_SYS_CTRL_SLEEPDEEP 0x00000004 // Deep Sleep Enable
12432 #define NVIC_SYS_CTRL_SLEEPEXIT 0x00000002 // Sleep on ISR Exit
12433 
12434 //*****************************************************************************

12437 //
12438 //*****************************************************************************
12439 #define NVIC_CFG_CTRL_STKALIGN 0x00000200 // Stack Alignment on Exception
12440  // Entry
12441 #define NVIC_CFG_CTRL_BFHFNMIGN 0x00000100 // Ignore Bus Fault in NMI and
12442  // Fault
12443 #define NVIC_CFG_CTRL_DIV0 0x00000010 // Trap on Divide by 0
12444 #define NVIC_CFG_CTRL_UNALIGNED 0x00000008 // Trap on Unaligned Access
12445 #define NVIC_CFG_CTRL_MAIN_PEND 0x00000002 // Allow Main Interrupt Trigger
12446 #define NVIC_CFG_CTRL_BASE_THR 0x00000001 // Thread State Control
12447

12480 //*****************************************************************************

12483 // register.
12484 //
12485 //*****************************************************************************
12486 #define NVIC_SYS_HND_CTRL_USAGE 0x00040000 // Usage Fault Enable
12487 #define NVIC_SYS_HND_CTRL_BUS 0x00020000 // Bus Fault Enable
12488 #define NVIC_SYS_HND_CTRL_MEM 0x00010000 // Memory Management Fault Enable
12489 #define NVIC_SYS_HND_CTRL_SVC 0x00008000 // SVC Call Pending
12490 #define NVIC_SYS_HND_CTRL_BUSP 0x00004000 // Bus Fault Pending
12491 #define NVIC_SYS_HND_CTRL_MEMP 0x00002000 // Memory Management Fault Pending
12492 #define NVIC_SYS_HND_CTRL_USAGEP \
12493  0x00001000 // Usage Fault Pending
12494 #define NVIC_SYS_HND_CTRL_TICK 0x00000800 // SysTick Exception Active
12495 #define NVIC_SYS_HND_CTRL_PNDSV 0x00000400 // PendSV Exception Active
12496 #define NVIC_SYS_HND_CTRL_MON 0x00000100 // Debug Monitor Active
12497 #define NVIC_SYS_HND_CTRL_SVCA 0x00000080 // SVC Call Active
12498 #define NVIC_SYS_HND_CTRL_USGA 0x00000008 // Usage Fault Active
12499 #define NVIC_SYS_HND_CTRL_BUSA 0x00000002 // Bus Fault Active
12500 #define NVIC_SYS_HND_CTRL_MEMA 0x00000001 // Memory Management Fault Active
12501 
12502 //*****************************************************************************
12503 //
12504 // The following are defines for the bit fields in the NVIC_FAULT_STAT
12505 // register.
12506 //
12507 //*****************************************************************************
12508 #define NVIC_FAULT_STAT_DIV0 0x02000000 // Divide-by-Zero Usage Fault
12509 #define NVIC_FAULT_STAT_UNALIGN 0x01000000 // Unaligned Access Usage Fault
12510 #define NVIC_FAULT_STAT_NOCP 0x00080000 // No Coprocessor Usage Fault
12511 #define NVIC_FAULT_STAT_INVPC 0x00040000 // Invalid PC Load Usage Fault
12512 #define NVIC_FAULT_STAT_INVSTAT 0x00020000 // Invalid State Usage Fault
12513 #define NVIC_FAULT_STAT_UNDEF 0x00010000 // Undefined Instruction Usage
12514  // Fault
12515 #define NVIC_FAULT_STAT_BFARV 0x00008000 // Bus Fault Address Register Valid
12516 #define NVIC_FAULT_STAT_BLSPERR 0x00002000 // Bus Fault on Floating-Point Lazy
12517  // State Preservation
12518 #define NVIC_FAULT_STAT_BSTKE 0x00001000 // Stack Bus Fault
12519 #define NVIC_FAULT_STAT_BUSTKE 0x00000800 // Unstack Bus Fault
12520 #define NVIC_FAULT_STAT_IMPRE 0x00000400 // Imprecise Data Bus Error
12521 #define NVIC_FAULT_STAT_PRECISE 0x00000200 // Precise Data Bus Error
12522 #define NVIC_FAULT_STAT_IBUS 0x00000100 // Instruction Bus Error
12523 #define NVIC_FAULT_STAT_MMARV 0x00000080 // Memory Management Fault Address
12524  // Register Valid
12525 #define NVIC_FAULT_STAT_MLSPERR 0x00000020 // Memory Management Fault on
12526  // Floating-Point Lazy State
12527  // Preservation
12528 #define NVIC_FAULT_STAT_MSTKE 0x00000010 // Stack Access Violation
12529 #define NVIC_FAULT_STAT_MUSTKE 0x00000008 // Unstack Access Violation
12530 #define NVIC_FAULT_STAT_DERR 0x00000002 // Data Access Violation
12531 #define NVIC_FAULT_STAT_IERR 0x00000001 // Instruction Access Violation
12532

12729 
12730 //*****************************************************************************
12731 //
12732 // The following are defines for the bit fields in the NVIC_DBG_CTRL register.
12733 //
12734 //*****************************************************************************
12735 #define NVIC_DBG_CTRL_DBGKEY_M 0xFFFF0000 // Debug key mask
12736 #define NVIC_DBG_CTRL_DBGKEY 0xA05F0000 // Debug key
12737 #define NVIC_DBG_CTRL_S_RESET_ST \
12738  0x02000000 // Core has reset since last read
12739 #define NVIC_DBG_CTRL_S_RETIRE_ST \
12740  0x01000000 // Core has executed insruction
12741  // since last read
12742 #define NVIC_DBG_CTRL_S_LOCKUP 0x00080000 // Core is locked up
12743 #define NVIC_DBG_CTRL_S_SLEEP 0x00040000 // Core is sleeping
12744 #define NVIC_DBG_CTRL_S_HALT 0x00020000 // Core status on halt
12745 #define NVIC_DBG_CTRL_S_REGRDY 0x00010000 // Register read/write available
12746 #define NVIC_DBG_CTRL_C_SNAPSTALL \
12747  0x00000020 // Breaks a stalled load/store
12748 #define NVIC_DBG_CTRL_C_MASKINT 0x00000008 // Mask interrupts when stepping
12749 #define NVIC_DBG_CTRL_C_STEP 0x00000004 // Step the core
12750 #define NVIC_DBG_CTRL_C_HALT 0x00000002 // Halt the core
12751 #define NVIC_DBG_CTRL_C_DEBUGEN 0x00000001 // Enable debug
12752 
12753 //*****************************************************************************
12754 //
12755 // The following are defines for the bit fields in the NVIC_DBG_XFER register.
12756 //
12757 //*****************************************************************************
12758 #define NVIC_DBG_XFER_REG_WNR 0x00010000 // Write or not read
12759 #define NVIC_DBG_XFER_REG_SEL_M 0x0000001F // Register
12760 #define NVIC_DBG_XFER_REG_R0 0x00000000 // Register R0
12761 #define NVIC_DBG_XFER_REG_R1 0x00000001 // Register R1
12762 #define NVIC_DBG_XFER_REG_R2 0x00000002 // Register R2
12763 #define NVIC_DBG_XFER_REG_R3 0x00000003 // Register R3
12764 #define NVIC_DBG_XFER_REG_R4 0x00000004 // Register R4
12765 #define NVIC_DBG_XFER_REG_R5 0x00000005 // Register R5
12766 #define NVIC_DBG_XFER_REG_R6 0x00000006 // Register R6
12767 #define NVIC_DBG_XFER_REG_R7 0x00000007 // Register R7
12768 #define NVIC_DBG_XFER_REG_R8 0x00000008 // Register R8
12769 #define NVIC_DBG_XFER_REG_R9 0x00000009 // Register R9
12770 #define NVIC_DBG_XFER_REG_R10 0x0000000A // Register R10
12771 #define NVIC_DBG_XFER_REG_R11 0x0000000B // Register R11
12772 #define NVIC_DBG_XFER_REG_R12 0x0000000C // Register R12
12773 #define NVIC_DBG_XFER_REG_R13 0x0000000D // Register R13
12774 #define NVIC_DBG_XFER_REG_R14 0x0000000E // Register R14
12775 #define NVIC_DBG_XFER_REG_R15 0x0000000F // Register R15
12776 #define NVIC_DBG_XFER_REG_FLAGS 0x00000010 // xPSR/Flags register
12777 #define NVIC_DBG_XFER_REG_MSP 0x00000011 // Main SP
12778 #define NVIC_DBG_XFER_REG_PSP 0x00000012 // Process SP
12779 #define NVIC_DBG_XFER_REG_DSP 0x00000013 // Deep SP
12780 #define NVIC_DBG_XFER_REG_CFBP 0x00000014 // Control/Fault/BasePri/PriMask
12781 
12782 //*****************************************************************************
12783 //
12784 // The following are defines for the bit fields in the NVIC_DBG_DATA register.
12785 //
12786 //*****************************************************************************
12787 #define NVIC_DBG_DATA_M 0xFFFFFFFF // Data temporary cache
12788 #define NVIC_DBG_DATA_S 0
12789 
12790 //*****************************************************************************
12791 //
12792 // The following are defines for the bit fields in the NVIC_DBG_INT register.
12793 //
12794 //*****************************************************************************
12795 #define NVIC_DBG_INT_HARDERR 0x00000400 // Debug trap on hard fault
12796 #define NVIC_DBG_INT_INTERR 0x00000200 // Debug trap on interrupt errors
12797 #define NVIC_DBG_INT_BUSERR 0x00000100 // Debug trap on bus error
12798 #define NVIC_DBG_INT_STATERR 0x00000080 // Debug trap on usage fault state
12799 #define NVIC_DBG_INT_CHKERR 0x00000040 // Debug trap on usage fault check
12800 #define NVIC_DBG_INT_NOCPERR 0x00000020 // Debug trap on coprocessor error
12801 #define NVIC_DBG_INT_MMERR 0x00000010 // Debug trap on mem manage fault
12802 #define NVIC_DBG_INT_RESET 0x00000008 // Core reset status
12803 #define NVIC_DBG_INT_RSTPENDCLR 0x00000004 // Clear pending core reset
12804 #define NVIC_DBG_INT_RSTPENDING 0x00000002 // Core reset is pending
12805 #define NVIC_DBG_INT_RSTVCATCH 0x00000001 // Reset vector catch
12806 
12807 //*****************************************************************************
12808 //
12809 // The following are defines for the bit fields in the NVIC_SW_TRIG register.
12810 //
12811 //*****************************************************************************
12812 #define NVIC_SW_TRIG_INTID_M 0x000000FF // Interrupt ID
12813 #define NVIC_SW_TRIG_INTID_S 0
12814 
12815 //*****************************************************************************
12816 //
12817 // The following are defines for the bit fields in the NVIC_FPCC register.
12818 //
12819 //*****************************************************************************
12820 #define NVIC_FPCC_ASPEN 0x80000000 // Automatic State Preservation
12821  // Enable
12822 #define NVIC_FPCC_LSPEN 0x40000000 // Lazy State Preservation Enable
12823 #define NVIC_FPCC_MONRDY 0x00000100 // Monitor Ready
12824 #define NVIC_FPCC_BFRDY 0x00000040 // Bus Fault Ready
12825 #define NVIC_FPCC_MMRDY 0x00000020 // Memory Management Fault Ready
12826 #define NVIC_FPCC_HFRDY 0x00000010 // Hard Fault Ready
12827 #define NVIC_FPCC_THREAD 0x00000008 // Thread Mode
12828 #define NVIC_FPCC_USER 0x00000002 // User Privilege Level
12829 #define NVIC_FPCC_LSPACT 0x00000001 // Lazy State Preservation Active
12830 
12831 //*****************************************************************************
12832 //
12833 // The following are defines for the bit fields in the NVIC_FPCA register.
12834 //
12835 //*****************************************************************************
12836 #define NVIC_FPCA_ADDRESS_M 0xFFFFFFF8 // Address
12837 #define NVIC_FPCA_ADDRESS_S 3
12838 
12839 //*****************************************************************************
12840 //
12841 // The following are defines for the bit fields in the NVIC_FPDSC register.
12842 //
12843 //*****************************************************************************
12844 #define NVIC_FPDSC_AHP 0x04000000 // AHP Bit Default
12845 #define NVIC_FPDSC_DN 0x02000000 // DN Bit Default
12846 #define NVIC_FPDSC_FZ 0x01000000 // FZ Bit Default
12847 #define NVIC_FPDSC_RMODE_M 0x00C00000 // RMODE Bit Default
12848 #define NVIC_FPDSC_RMODE_RN 0x00000000 // Round to Nearest (RN) mode
12849 #define NVIC_FPDSC_RMODE_RP 0x00400000 // Round towards Plus Infinity (RP)
12850  // mode
12851 #define NVIC_FPDSC_RMODE_RM 0x00800000 // Round towards Minus Infinity
12852  // (RM) mode
12853 #define NVIC_FPDSC_RMODE_RZ 0x00C00000 // Round towards Zero (RZ) mode
